translation.en: [man] So I put my finger here, and check this...
translation.zh: -我就把手指放在这里 你看-嗯

translation.en: the watch tells me I have a heart problem.
translation.zh: 这块表显示我心脏有问题

translation.en: Wouldn't a mirror tell you the same thing?
translation.zh: 这你照镜子还看不出来？

translation.en: Yeah, but this has weather, too.
translation.zh: 能是能 不过这里还有天气显示

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: We got an hour until we're meeting the ladies for dinner.
translation.zh: 我们和女士们约好的晚餐时间还有一小时呢

translation.en: -Yeah. -You wanna catch a beer?
translation.zh: -是-喝啤酒去？

translation.en: I can't. I gotta run a few errands.
translation.zh: 不行 我还有好多事呢

translation.en: What? You don't want a beer? What's wrong?
translation.zh: 怎么？你不想去喝啤酒？你怎么了？

translation.en: [sighs] I... got the results back from the detective exam.
translation.zh: 警探考试的成绩出来了

translation.en: You failed again? This is why I never took that test.
translation.zh: 你又没过？所以我从不去考那个

translation.en: All the anxiety and disappointment.
translation.zh: 总是担心 总是失望

translation.en: At some point, you have to realize you have hit your ceiling
translation.zh: 有些时候 你必须要清楚你已经到极限了

translation.en: and just give up.
translation.zh: 放弃就行了

translation.en: You know, you should go around and speak at schools.
translation.zh: 知道吗 你应该去学校演讲去

translation.en: -That was very inspiring. -I should. Kids need to hear this shit.
translation.zh: -你很会启发人-我是该去 应该让孩子们都听听

translation.en: I don't get it, man.
translation.zh: 我想不通 哥们儿

translation.en: I know all the answers, I just freeze under pressure.
translation.zh: 答案我都知道 可一紧张就发挥不出来

translation.en: You know, I can't take the exam for, like, three more months,
translation.zh: 差不多三个月内 我都不能再考了

translation.en: so I gotta continue lying to Audrey.
translation.zh: 还得瞒着奥德丽

translation.en: So when we're at dinner tonight, please,
translation.zh: 所以今晚晚餐的时候

translation.en: -tell your wi-- -Ah! No.
translation.zh: -请告诉你老婆…-啊 不行

translation.en: Come on, man. You know I'll lie for you anytime.
translation.zh: 别这样 哥们儿 你知道为了你 我谎话连篇都行

translation.en: I will cover up dead bodies for you.
translation.zh: 帮你毁尸灭迹都可以

translation.en: But if I ask Holly to lie to your wife, there's no way we're messing around.
translation.zh: 但要我让霍莉骗你老婆是不可能蒙混过关的 《疯狂星期五》里才有的事

translation.en: It's Freaky Friday!
translation.zh: 《疯狂星期五》里才有的事

translation.en: You don't have to lie, just tell her to ignore when I'm lying.
translation.zh: 不用你骗谁你就让她在我撒谎的时候别多话

translation.en: That's it.
translation.zh: 就这样

translation.en: -Okay, fine. -Thank you.
translation.zh: -那好吧-谢谢

translation.en: -You owe me. -[phone buzzing]
translation.zh: 记住你欠我的

translation.en: See you tonight.
translation.zh: 晚上见

translation.en: I gotta get Claritin. Claritin.
translation.zh: 要买氯雷他定 氯雷他定

translation.en: [gasps] Oh, my God! Look!
translation.zh: 哦 我的天 看哪

translation.en: [woman 1] He took her in a helicopter?
translation.zh: -哦 天哪-他带她坐的直升飞机？

translation.en: My husband won't even pay for Uber Black.
translation.zh: 我丈夫连优步轿车都舍不得带我坐

translation.en: [chuckles] Yeah. I don't even-- I can't even remember the last time
translation.zh: 对 我甚至都记不起

translation.en: that Nick did anything even remotely romantic.
translation.zh: 对 我甚至都记不起 尼克上次什么时候稍微有点浪漫了

translation.en: I mean, he used to leave me, like, cute little mixtapes,
translation.zh: 他以前还会给我留那种很可爱的小混合磁带

translation.en: little love notes in the bathroom.
translation.zh: 在卫生间里放求爱小字条

translation.en: Love notes are dead.
translation.zh: 求爱字条早就过时了

translation.en: When my husband wants to have sex, he just texts me the eggplant and doughnut emoji.
translation.zh: 我丈夫想要爱爱的时候会给我发茄子和甜甜圈的表情符

translation.en: Eggplant and doughnut--
translation.zh: 茄子和甜甜圈…

translation.en: Oh. He's the eggplant.
translation.zh: 哦 他是茄子

translation.en: More like a fingerling potato.
translation.zh: 更像是霜打的马铃薯

translation.en: [woman 2] It doesn't take that much.
translation.zh: 真的不用多费劲的

translation.en: There are guys at the intersection selling flowers.
translation.zh: 十字路口就有卖花的

translation.en: You just roll down the window, grab a bunch, bring 'em home.
translation.zh: 只要摇下车窗伸手买一束拿回家就行了

translation.en: -I mean, they couldn't make it any easier. -[woman 2] No kidding.
translation.zh: 我说真的 他们就不想让你好过 没错

translation.en: I mean, tomorrow is our 15th wedding anniversary.
translation.zh: 明天是我们的十五周年结婚纪念日

translation.en: I'm still waiting on that trip to Europe he promised me on our wedding day.
translation.zh: 我却还在等他实现婚礼那天许下要带我去欧洲旅游的承诺

translation.en: -[woman 1] That's been 15 years? -Yeah.
translation.zh: （很快！爱你的尼克） -已经十五年了？-是啊

translation.en: -I could have walked to Europe by now. -[laughs]
translation.zh: 我走都走到欧洲了

translation.en: You know, you just have to tell him.
translation.zh: 知道吗 你应该提醒他一下

translation.en: I just don't want to have to tell him. I just want him to know.
translation.zh: 我不想提醒他 我想让他自己记得

translation.en: -No, they never just know. -I know.
translation.zh: -不 他们永远都记不起来的-我知道

translation.en: -That doesn't happen. -You have to tell men everything.
translation.zh: -不可能的-他什么事都要你说

translation.en: If you want the dishes to not go in the sink, you have to tell them.
translation.zh: 你必须告诉他 碟子碗都放到水槽里

translation.en: If you want him to shower before he comes to bed,
translation.zh: 必须告诉他

translation.en: -you have to ask him. -Ugh.
translation.zh: 上床之前要洗澡

translation.en: That's why they have those signs in bathrooms at restaurants
translation.zh: 这就是为什么在餐馆的卫生间里

translation.en: to tell employees to wash their hands.
translation.zh: 会贴着让员工洗手的标志了

translation.en: Those aren't for women, guys. Those are for men.
translation.zh: 那些标志不是给女人看的是提醒男人的

translation.en: Or maybe you could just text him, airplane, wine glass,
translation.zh: 也许你可以用表情符给他发条信息 飞机、酒杯

translation.en: Italian flag, eggplant, doughnut, doughnut, doughnut.
translation.zh: 意大利国旗、茄子、甜甜圈、甜甜圈、甜甜圈

translation.en: Let's go with the 50.
translation.zh: 来50美元的吧

translation.en: Claritin...
translation.zh: 氯雷他定

translation.en: [cashier] Hi, welcome.
translation.zh: 嗨 欢迎光临

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: -[woman] Thanks a lot. -[register beeping]
translation.zh: 好 谢谢

translation.en: Are you gonna tell 'em about the stuff in your backpack?
translation.zh: 你会告诉他们你背包里的东西吧？

translation.en: Mind your own business, man. I'm paying for this.
translation.zh: 管好你自己的事吧 我又不是不付钱

translation.en: I like your sneakers. They must be expensive.
translation.zh: 我喜欢你的运动鞋 一定很贵吧

translation.en: Is that why can't afford the Monster Energy Drink
translation.zh: 所以才买不起怪兽高能饮料

translation.en: or the Flamin' Hot Cheetos?
translation.zh: 或者火辣芝士吗？

translation.en: -Hang on. Hang on. -Hey, let go of me, man.
translation.zh: -等等-嘿 别烦我 老哥

translation.en: I can't believe I was right.
translation.zh: 没想到让我猜对了

translation.en: Keep your mouth shut. I'll mess you up, old man.
translation.zh: 你闭嘴 否则我会让你好看 老头子

translation.en: Old man. Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 老头子 哦 我的天

translation.en: First of all,
translation.zh: 首先

translation.en: I should throw you in jail just for calling me "old man,"
translation.zh: 就你这一句老头子也够我送你去蹲大牢

translation.en: but you bring that stuff back,
translation.zh: 不过要是你把东西都放回去

translation.en: I'll let you go 'cause I'm late for dinner and I'm hungry as shit.
translation.zh: 我就饶过你因为我晚餐迟到了 饿得要死

translation.en: Go ahead.
translation.zh: 快去

translation.en: -[man 1] Tylenol PM? Am I right? -[man 2] No.
translation.zh: 泰诺安？对吧？ -不 她不用那个-它有副作用

translation.en: [woman 1] It's not good for that. It depends on what time of year you go.
translation.zh: -不 她不用那个-它有副作用 -但要看你在一年的什么时候去-谢谢

translation.en: [woman 2] That makes sense. Can I get another? We're gonna have another one?
translation.zh: -我再来一杯可以吗？-还要再来一杯？

translation.en: I'm just saying, we're paying today. Maybe you can take it easy a little bit.
translation.zh: 我是说 今天我们请客你不用那么小心

translation.en: Hey, hey. Nick. Nick. What-- What's wrong with you?
translation.zh: -嘿 尼克 你怎么回事？-对不起

translation.en: Sorry. Should I not order another drink, Detective?
translation.zh: 我不能再喝一杯了 警探？

translation.en: No. Holly, order another drink.
translation.zh: -不 霍莉 再点一杯吧-你想点几杯就点几杯

translation.en: [chuckles] Order as much as you want. I was joking around.
translation.zh: -不 霍莉 再点一杯吧-你想点几杯就点几杯 -我是开玩笑的-一点都不好笑

translation.en: -That's not funny. -The reason--
translation.zh: -我是开玩笑的-一点都不好笑

translation.en: I'm just in a great mood because I had a great day today.
translation.zh: 因为我心情好 今天我过得不错

translation.en: -Did we have a great day or what? -It was a fabulous day. Incredible day.
translation.zh: 我们今天过得不错吧？ -很不错 这一天棒极了-好吧

translation.en: Really? Did you get another hot case?
translation.zh: -真的？又接了很刺激的案子？-对

translation.en: Of what?
translation.zh: 什么案子？

translation.en: -"What." -[laughing] That was good. No, listen.
translation.zh: “什么案子”？很有意思的 听着

translation.en: Going great, kid. I promise you.
translation.zh: 特别精彩 小家伙 我保证

translation.en: It's like, uh, they're trusting me more and more,
translation.zh: 他们越来越信任我了

translation.en: and I, um, I wish I could tell you what it was,
translation.zh: 我真希望我能告诉你什么案子

translation.en: but it's-- it's confidential.
translation.zh: 但是这是机密

translation.en: -Wait a second. -What?
translation.zh: -等等-怎么了？

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 哦 我的天哪

translation.en: -What is this? -[Nick] What is that?
translation.zh: -这是什么？-那是什么？

translation.en: My baby Jimmy got it for me for my birthday.
translation.zh: 我宝贝儿吉米送我的生日礼物

translation.en: -Jimmy! -What?
translation.zh: -什么？-吉米

translation.en: -[Holly] Celebration diamonds. -Oh, my gosh.
translation.zh: -庆祝钻戒-我们买了 宝贝儿 哦 天哪 太漂亮了

translation.en: -It's gorgeous! -Thank you, Audrey.
translation.zh: 哦 天哪 太漂亮了 -谢谢 奥德丽-很贵的

translation.en: -Very expensive. -[Audrey] Wow, Jimmy.
translation.zh: -谢谢 奥德丽-很贵的 -哇哦 吉米-是吧？

translation.en: I got you something special. I promise, you're gonna be very happy.
translation.zh: -我也给你准备了很特别的-我想也是 我保证你会高兴的

translation.en: -[Holly] Really? -I can't wait.
translation.zh: -真的？-都等不及要看了

translation.en: See, I would've pegged you, Nick, as an Amazon gift card kinda guy,
translation.zh: 尼克 我认为你是只会送亚马逊礼物卡的那种人

translation.en: but... I'm no detective.
translation.zh: 不过我不是警探

translation.en: Hey! You know what, guys?
translation.zh: -嘿 猜猜看 伙计们？-是

translation.en: Let's toast to my friends, Nick and Audrey. Fifteen wonderful years.
translation.zh: 为了我们的朋友尼克和奥德丽十五年美好的时光 我们来干一杯

translation.en: Absolutely.
translation.zh: -没错-好

translation.en: -[Jimmy] Fifteen. -Here's to true love, guys.
translation.zh: -十五年-敬真爱 干杯

translation.en: Fifteen.
translation.zh: 十五年

translation.en: -True love. -Yeah.
translation.zh: 真爱

translation.en: Dinner was insane, but that's expected.
translation.zh: 出去吃晚饭真蠢 却又都想去

translation.en: But I'll tell you what, I want to record Holly chewing her ice cubes,
translation.zh: 不过你知道吗我真想把霍莉嚼冰块的情景录下来

translation.en: use it as my alarm in the morning. That's--
translation.zh: 当成我早上起床的闹钟 真是…

translation.en: Guarantee me of wanting to wake up and leave.
translation.zh: 准会让我想跳起来跑着去上班

translation.en: What's the matter? You didn't like that joke?
translation.zh: 怎么？你不喜欢这个笑话？

translation.en: I'm flossing.
translation.zh: 我在剔牙呢

translation.en: [muffled] I can see that.
translation.zh: 我看到了

translation.en: You're doing it extra hard tonight.
translation.zh: 你今晚剔得太用劲了

translation.en: And I'm not sleeping with the fan on tonight. I hate that sound.
translation.zh: 今晚我不想开着风扇睡觉我讨厌那个声音

translation.en: No fan necessary. We'll crank the AC, babe.
translation.zh: 不用风扇了 我们开空调吧 宝贝儿

translation.en: Uh-oh. What, what, what? You're gonna yell at me? I can see this. Hang on.
translation.zh: 怎么了？你要发飙了？我看出来了 等一下

translation.en: Why don't you do some more angry flossing?
translation.zh: 再来段愤怒版的剔牙？

translation.en: How come we haven't gone to Europe, Nick?
translation.zh: 为什么我们从没去过欧洲 尼克？

translation.en: You have to explain this to me.
translation.zh: 你必须给我解释清楚

translation.en: We never go anywhere.
translation.zh: 我们从没出去过

translation.en: [stammers] We travel. I took you to the Poconos that time.
translation.zh: 我…我们旅游过啊我那次还带你去过波科诺斯

translation.en: What? The Poco-- That was-- That was for a funeral, Nick.
translation.zh: 什么？波科…那次是去参加葬礼 尼克

translation.en: How about, uh, when we went to Virginia
translation.zh: 那我们去弗吉尼亚州我叔叔在临终安养院

translation.en: when my uncle was in a hospice and we got to see him die?
translation.zh: 那我们去弗吉尼亚州我叔叔在临终安养院 我们去见他最后一面那次呢？

translation.en: -We did that. -Ugh, Nick. Come on.
translation.zh: -我们出去过的-尼克

translation.en: I'm talking about the postcard.
translation.zh: 别这样 我说的是明信片的事

translation.en: -You don't remember that? -I remember it. Of course I remember it.
translation.zh: -你都忘记了？-我记得 我当然记得

translation.en: It's been 15 years, Nick. I don't know what we're waitin' for.
translation.zh: 都十五年了 尼克我不知道有什么好等的

translation.en: [sighs] Now you've gone and done it, Audrey.
translation.zh: 你就非要现在闹吗 奥德丽

translation.en: What? What'd I do?
translation.zh: 什么？我闹什么了？

translation.en: I told you I had something big for you at dinner,
translation.zh: 晚饭的时候我告诉你给你准备了惊喜的

translation.en: and you couldn't wait till tomorrow morning?
translation.zh: 你都不能等到明天早上？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不能

translation.en: We're finally going to Europe. Happy anniversary.
translation.zh: 我们终于要去欧洲了 纪念日快乐

translation.en: Oh, my God. I have chills.
translation.zh: 哦 我的天哪 我都起鸡皮疙瘩了

translation.en: Oh, my God! Oh, my God!
translation.zh: 哦 我的天哪

translation.en: Oh, my God! I'm so--
translation.zh: 哦 我的天哪 我真的…我破坏了你的惊喜

translation.en: -I ruined your surprise! -Shh. You didn't ruin anything.
translation.zh: 我真的…我破坏了你的惊喜 你什么都没破坏

translation.en: You're the greatest. You deserve it. I love you.
translation.zh: 你最好了 怎么对你都不为过 我爱你

translation.en: -I love you! -It's still a surprise. I swear.
translation.zh: -我爱你-还会是个惊喜 我发誓

translation.en: -We can afford it, right? This is all-- -We can afford it, of course.
translation.zh: -我们能负担得起 对吧？这一切…-我们能负担得起 当然能

translation.en: -Okay. -I'm getting my raise this year.
translation.zh: -那就好-我今年就要涨工资了

translation.en: -Right. -We're all set. Come on.
translation.zh: -对-我们什么问题都没有 走吧

translation.en: -[Audrey] Hello. Hi. -Hello.
translation.zh: -你好 嗨-你好

translation.en: So, uh, we are on our honeymoon,
translation.zh: 你好 我们在度蜜月

translation.en: and I was wondering if we could possibly get an upgrade
translation.zh: 我在想能不能给我们升舱

translation.en: because I have miles. Maybe--
translation.zh: 因为我有里程数

translation.en: I don't even know if it's from this airline, but do they expire, or--
translation.zh: 能吗？不知道是不是你们公司的里程会过期吗 还是…

translation.en: Sir, you would have needed to request that in advance.
translation.zh: 先生 你要提前提出申请的

translation.en: -[Audrey] Yeah. -Right this way, please.
translation.zh: -对-请这边走

translation.en: -Thank you. I'm so sorry. -We did try advance. I tried calling.
translation.zh: -谢谢 对不起了-好吧 我提前申请过 -我打过电话 可是没人…-你给谁打的电话？

translation.en: -And, um, nobody-- -Who'd you call?
translation.zh: -我打过电话 可是没人…-你给谁打的电话？

translation.en: -Crazy busy signals. -Really?
translation.zh: -总是占线占线-是吗？

translation.en: -It's the busy signals! -Who did you try to call?
translation.zh: -一直都是忙线-你给谁打的电话？

translation.en: I don't want to give it away. It was the butler.
translation.zh: 我不想剧透 是男管家巴特勒

translation.en: -The butler did it. -[sighs]
translation.zh: 男管家巴特勒干的

translation.en: It's never the butler who did it.
translation.zh: 才不是男管家巴特勒呢

translation.en: I don't even think there are butlers.
translation.zh: 我都没想到还有什么男管家巴特勒

translation.en: That's just a word created for those goofy books you're addicted to.
translation.zh: 只是这些让你上瘾的书编出来的角色

translation.en: Would you just please, please shh?
translation.zh: 你能不能…

translation.en: Leave my books alone, okay? Just let me read.
translation.zh: 别评价我看什么 行吗？让我安静看会儿书

translation.en: I just like-- Makes me happy.
translation.zh: 我就是喜欢看 乐意看

translation.en: Are you okay? You're cranky. Are you bored?
translation.zh: 你没事吧？你今天有点怪 你很无聊吗？

translation.en: -I'm gonna go to sleep. -Take a nap.
translation.zh: -好吧-那我睡会儿 -睡吧-你不介意吧？

translation.en: -Are you okay with that? -Wait, don't--
translation.zh: -睡吧-你不介意吧？ 等等 别那样 座椅别往后放

translation.en: But just, please, don't-- don't lay all the way back.
translation.zh: 等等 别那样 座椅别往后放

translation.en: -Don't take it back? -No.
translation.zh: -别往后放？-别放

translation.en: Why? You don't want my double chin to show?
translation.zh: 为什么？你不想看到我的双下巴？

translation.en: It's not your chins, okay. It's just rude.
translation.zh: 不是你的下巴 好吧 只是那样不礼貌

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 好吧

translation.en: -Okay. 'Cause you splay out. -All right.
translation.zh: -好了 因为你会七仰八叉的-好吧

translation.en: And then your seat is in, like, the lap of the guy behind you.
translation.zh: 然后你的座位就好像陷在后面那个人的怀里

translation.en: -So just be considerate of everybody. -I'll stay up. Thank you.
translation.zh: -为大家考虑考虑-那我就不放了 谢谢

translation.en: Timber.
translation.zh: 倒啦

translation.en: [whispering] Oh, excuse me.
translation.zh: 哦 对不起

translation.en: -Hi. -Hello. Hi.
translation.zh: -嗨-你好

translation.en: Could I please have some earplugs?
translation.zh: 能给我一副耳塞吗？

translation.en: Yes. For nine dollars.
translation.zh: 可以 九美元

translation.en: Nine dollars? For earplugs?
translation.zh: 九美元？一副耳塞？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: That's okay. I'll just-- I'll just use my peanuts.
translation.zh: 算了 我还是用花生吧

translation.en: I'll just--
translation.zh: 就是太…

translation.en: Wow.
translation.zh: 哇哦

translation.en: A fellow insomniac, I see.
translation.zh: 一个失眠的人 我看到了

translation.en: Jesus. Yes. I--
translation.zh: 天哪 是 我…

translation.en: Yep. I know, right? I just cannot sleep on these things.
translation.zh: 是 我知道 行了吧？在这上面我就是睡不着

translation.en: So what brings you across the pond?
translation.zh: 你要到大洋彼岸去干什么？

translation.en: Actually, it's my-- it's my honeymoon.
translation.zh: 其实我是去度蜜月

translation.en: Oh. Congratulations.
translation.zh: 哦 恭喜你

translation.en: -Thank you. -Where's your husband?
translation.zh: -谢谢-你丈夫呢？

translation.en: Dead.
translation.zh: 死了

translation.en: Asleep. He's dead-- dead asleep.
translation.zh: 睡着了 很死 睡得很死

translation.en: We've actually been married for 15 years, but we just have been very, very, very, very busy.
translation.zh: 其实我们结婚都十五年了可一直都忙得没有时间

translation.en: Then a toast to the whirlwind that is your life.
translation.zh: 那我们来为你生活的一片忙乱干杯

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: -Sorry, ma'am. -Oh, yes!
translation.zh: -对不起 女士-哦 是

translation.en: The bar is for first class passengers only.
translation.zh: 只有头等舱才能享受酒吧待遇

translation.en: Of course. Of course it is. I'm so sorry, yes.
translation.zh: 当然了 对不起

translation.en: I will head back to the lower class cabin
translation.zh: 对 我现在就回普通舱去

translation.en: and sit where I should and, uh... shovel some coal.
translation.zh: 坐我该坐的地方 再挖点煤去

translation.en: She's my guest.
translation.zh: -她是我的客人-不

translation.en: Unfortunately, sir, she'd need her own first class ticket.
translation.zh: 很遗憾 先生她要有自己的头等舱机票

translation.en: Charles Cavendish.
translation.zh: -我需要…-我是查尔斯卡文迪什

translation.en: I'm so sorry, sir.
translation.zh: 非常对不起 先生

translation.en: Whoa!
translation.zh: 哇哦

translation.en: Charles Cavendish?
translation.zh: 查尔斯卡文迪什

translation.en: Is that your real name?
translation.zh: 这是你的真名吗？

translation.en: [chuckles] I'm afraid so.
translation.zh: 恐怕是的

translation.en: I mean, that sounds like it just fell right out of a... mystery novel.
translation.zh: 我是说真像是我读的悬疑小说里的名字

translation.en: And which character would I be?
translation.zh: 那我是什么角色？

translation.en: Name like that, you'd have to be the bad guy.
translation.zh: 你这样的名字 应该都是坏蛋

translation.en: Well... here's to the bad guys.
translation.zh: 哦 那我们就来敬这个坏蛋

translation.en: -Okay, so your fiancée... -Hm.
translation.zh: 好吧 你说你未婚妻

translation.en: ...leaves you...
translation.zh: 抛弃了你

translation.en: [chuckles] ...for your elderly uncle--
translation.zh: 投入了你年迈叔叔的怀抱

translation.en: Will you two kindly shut up?
translation.zh: -这让你…-能不能请你们两个闭嘴？

translation.en: Oh, be quiet.
translation.zh: 哦 你闭嘴吧

translation.en: Or we shall tell everyone about the ferret you've smuggled in here.
translation.zh: 或者要不要我们告诉大家你带上来的雪貂

translation.en: -[giggling] -The whole thing is tawdry, I know.
translation.zh: 这么做太低俗了 我知道

translation.en: -[under breath] Tawdry. -He desired my betrothed,
translation.zh: -低俗-马尔科姆叔叔想要我的未婚妻

translation.en: and Uncle Malcolm always gets what he wants.
translation.zh: 没有他得不到的东西

translation.en: Malcolm. Uncle Malcolm.
translation.zh: 马尔科姆 马尔科姆叔叔

translation.en: -Quince. -Uncle--
translation.zh: -肯斯-叔叔…

translation.en: Malcolm Quince is your uncle? That billionaire?
translation.zh: 马尔科姆肯斯是你叔叔？那个亿万富翁？

translation.en: -That's the one. -Oh, my gosh.
translation.zh: -就是他-哦 我的天

translation.en: He looks just like this...
translation.zh: 要是这个皱巴巴的橄榄

translation.en: if this wrinkled olive had $70 billion.
translation.zh: 也有七百亿美元身家就差不多和他看起来一个样

translation.en: Seventy billion dollars.
translation.zh: 七百亿美元

translation.en: I'm traveling to Monaco with the newlyweds on his yacht
translation.zh: 我要和这对新婚燕尔乘着他的游艇

translation.en: for the Grand Prix this weekend.
translation.zh: 去参加这周末的大奖赛

translation.en: Why? Why would you do that?
translation.zh: 为什么？你为什么要去？

translation.en: Why would you go on their yacht after what they just did?
translation.zh: 为什么他们那么对你你还要坐他的游艇去？

translation.en: Because I'm English, Mrs. Spitz.
translation.zh: 因为我是英国人 斯皮茨太太

translation.en: -I'm a glutton for social masochism. -Oh.
translation.zh: -我是社会受虐狂-哦

translation.en: And I plan on getting blind drunk and ruining the festivities.
translation.zh: 我打算喝得酩酊大醉 去砸场子

translation.en: Okay. I support that.
translation.zh: 好 我支持你

translation.en: -I say, Audrey... -Hm.
translation.zh: 我说 奥德丽

translation.en: Do you and your husband have plans this weekend?
translation.zh: 你和你丈夫这周末有没有安排？

translation.en: Holy shit! This plane has a bar?
translation.zh: 我勒个去 这航班上还有酒吧？

translation.en: Sir, this is the first class lounge.
translation.zh: 先生 这里是头等舱休息区

translation.en: I'm gonna have to ask you to return to your seat.
translation.zh: 我得请您回到您的座位上去

translation.en: There's bars on planes now?
translation.zh: 现在飞机上有酒吧了？

translation.en: Planes have bars now. In first class.
translation.zh: 现在飞机的头等舱里有酒吧了

translation.en: This is-- Man, I wish my mother was still alive to see this.
translation.zh: 真是…天哪 真希望我妈还能活着看到这一切

translation.en: She was an alcoholic, but a nice one.
translation.zh: 她是个酒鬼 不过是个好酒鬼

translation.en: Sir, if you don't return to your seat, I'm gonna have to call--
translation.zh: 先生 如果您不回座位 我就要叫…

translation.en: The cops.
translation.zh: 警察了

translation.en: So that's my wife
translation.zh: 那位是我妻子

translation.en: talking to that handsome guy over there with the one chin.
translation.zh: 她在和那边那个一个下巴的帅哥聊天

translation.en: So I'm gonna go break that shit up, possibly grab myself a beer,
translation.zh: 所以我要过去搅局或许再给自己拿瓶啤酒 可能再给你拿点抗焦虑药

translation.en: maybe you a Xanax.
translation.zh: 可能再给你拿点抗焦虑药

translation.en: ...the wine on board is worth a letter.
translation.zh: …葡萄牙 航班上的红酒值得写封表扬信

translation.en: [Charles] People don't write letters anymore, do they?
translation.zh: 如今都没人写信了吧？

translation.en: -[Charles] Such a pity. -It's just, it's all so tactical.
translation.zh: -真是遗憾-一切都太高明了

translation.en: Yeah, that's true.
translation.zh: 是 没错

translation.en: Hey! Nick.
translation.zh: 嘿 尼克

translation.en: -[Nick] How are you? -Hi, honey. You're awake.
translation.zh: -你好啊？-嗨 亲爱的 你醒了

translation.en: -Was your nappie good? -Been awake.
translation.zh: -你的盹打的怎么样？-我根本没睡着

translation.en: -I was looking for you. -I know, I'm--
translation.zh: -我到处找你-我知道 我就在这儿

translation.en: -Well, I met this lovely gentleman. -Oh, yeah?
translation.zh: -哦 我碰到了这位绅士-哦 是吗？

translation.en: I'd like you to meet Charles Cavendish.
translation.zh: 这位是查尔斯卡文迪什

translation.en: -He's a lord. Right? -How do you do?
translation.zh: -他是位勋爵 对吧？-你好？

translation.en: -[Audrey] A lord? -Well, actually a viscount.
translation.zh: -勋爵？-哦 其实是子爵

translation.en: -Oh. -Although viscounts are addressed as Lord,
translation.zh: 不过鉴于可爱的奥德丽弄混了

translation.en: which probably accounts for the lovely Audrey's confusion.
translation.zh: 子爵也可以称为勋爵

translation.en: There you go. She gets confused with me too.
translation.zh: 可不是 她也经常把我弄混

translation.en: Sometimes I'm the king. Sometimes I'm Daddy.
translation.zh: 有时候我是国王 有时候又是爸爸

translation.en: So... can I get a Labatts, brother?
translation.zh: 能给我瓶拉巴特啤酒吗 小哥？

translation.en: That'll be 17 euro.
translation.zh: 17欧元

translation.en: No, no, no. Please.
translation.zh: 不 给我吧

translation.en: The beer is on me.
translation.zh: 我请客 来

translation.en: I'm not just taking a beer from somebody I don't know.
translation.zh: 我不会喝不认识人的啤酒

translation.en: Oh, my gosh.
translation.zh: 哦 天哪

translation.en: And I do hope you take advantage of my other offer.
translation.zh: 我真的希望你能赏光

translation.en: Hey. I'm not just gonna stand here
translation.zh: 嘿 我不会站在这里

translation.en: while you offer to pay me to have sex with my wife.
translation.zh: 眼睁睁看你着你出钱要和我老婆上床

translation.en: But out of curiosity, how much are we talking?
translation.zh: 不过出于好奇 你能出多少？

translation.en: -Great. -I wouldn't do it.
translation.zh: -太棒了-我不会同意的

translation.en: -Hey, listen to me. -What?
translation.zh: -嘿 听我说-我只是…什么？

translation.en: He is inviting us to spend the weekend with him on a yacht with his family.
translation.zh: 他想邀请我们去游艇上和他家人一起过周末

translation.en: Well, we have plans.
translation.zh: 是嘛 我们有安排了

translation.en: On a bus.
translation.zh: 坐巴士

translation.en: A bus that is bound for the idyllic village of San Grigio,
translation.zh: 去往圣格里戈的和平美丽的村庄

translation.en: where we can watch a demonstration on how they age ham.
translation.zh: 在那里我们能看到他们怎么风干火腿

translation.en: -Let me explain something. -Tell me what I'm missing.
translation.zh: -听我解释-说吧 -告诉我错过了什么 说吧-你开玩笑吧？

translation.en: -Are you kidding me? -Go.
translation.zh: -告诉我错过了什么 说吧-你开玩笑吧？

translation.en: We would be sailing around European harbors.
translation.zh: 我们会绕欧洲各港口航行

translation.en: -Yeah. -Okay? We'd be eating fresh fish.
translation.zh: -好-好吧？能吃到新鲜的鱼

translation.en: -Right. -And we'd be drinking wine.
translation.zh: -是-能喝到红酒

translation.en: -Hmm. -We'd be together.
translation.zh: 我们还能在一起

translation.en: That's nice.
translation.zh: 真不错

translation.en: -They have a chef. -They have a chef.
translation.zh: -他们还有大厨-他们还有大厨

translation.en: His name is Maurice. Maurice?
translation.zh: 他的名字叫莫瑞斯 莫瑞斯？

translation.en: -Maurice, yes. -Maurice.
translation.zh: -莫瑞斯 没错-莫瑞斯

translation.en: "Some people call me Maurice."
translation.zh: “有人叫我莫瑞斯”

translation.en: Remember that one?
translation.zh: 记得吧？

translation.en: -Can I talk to you for a second? -Sure.
translation.zh: -我和你好好说说？-当然可以

translation.en: [Nick] I gotcha.
translation.zh: -好-好 我明白了

translation.en: So listen-- What are you doing?
translation.zh: 听着 你要干什么？

translation.en: Why would two adults come into a bathroom on an airplane?
translation.zh: 两个成年人挤在航班上的一个洗手间里还能干什么？

translation.en: Honey, come on. To have a private conversation.
translation.zh: 亲爱的 得了 单独谈话啊

translation.en: Ah, that's funny.
translation.zh: 太好笑了

translation.en: Listen. I'm just trying to understand
translation.zh: 听着 我真想不通

translation.en: why you are turning down the opportunity of a lifetime.
translation.zh: 你为什么要拒绝这千载难逢的好机会

translation.en: Because I don't trust that guy.
translation.zh: 因为我不信任那个人

translation.en: -Why? -'Cause instincts.
translation.zh: -为什么？-因为直觉

translation.en: Your instincts?
translation.zh: 你的直觉？

translation.en: The same ones that told you you were about to get laid in here?
translation.zh: 就是告诉你要在这里嘿咻的直觉？

translation.en: I'm not getting laid?
translation.zh: 你不是要和我嘿咻？

translation.en: Come on! When is the next time you and I are gonna be able to get on a yacht?
translation.zh: 别傻了 我们下次乘游艇要等到猴年马月啊？

translation.en: I'm just saying, all those times we're eating ham sandwiches
translation.zh: 我是说每次我们吃火腿三明治的时候

translation.en: and you're always asking, "How do they age the ham?"
translation.zh: 你都总是会问他们怎么风干火腿的

translation.en: -Never had that-- -We'll never ask that question again
translation.zh: -我们再也不用问这个问题了…-我再也不问那问题了

translation.en: -because we'll be in San Grigio. -That never happened.
translation.zh: -…因为我们就要去圣格里戈了-绝对不行

translation.en: They'll give us the reason on how they do it so perfectly.
translation.zh: -…他们会给我们讲解-我不明白你在说什么 …怎么能口感纯正 好了

translation.en: Okay. You wanna know the truth? -You're breaking my heart. -Why?
translation.zh: 想听实话吗 你现在让我很伤心

translation.en: I feel like a schmuck
translation.zh: -为什么？-我觉得自己很蠢

translation.en: because I've been working my ass off and saving money, and now you know why.
translation.zh: 因为我加班加点节衣缩食现在你知道为什么了吧

translation.en: It was to take us on this trip. And I know I'm not a duke.
translation.zh: 我想带你来旅游 我知道我不是公爵

translation.en: I understand. He's a viscount, but--
translation.zh: 我明白 他是子爵 可是…

translation.en: -I don't even know what that is. -I know. It's okay.
translation.zh: -可我连子爵是什么都不清楚-我知道 没关系

translation.en: I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 对不起

translation.en: I love you.
translation.zh: 我爱你

translation.en: -I got lost. I got swept up in it. -I know.
translation.zh: 我失态了我被冲昏头脑了 不过没关系

translation.en: But it's okay. We're gonna do the bus. It's gonna be great.
translation.zh: 我失态了我被冲昏头脑了 不过没关系 我们去坐巴士 会很开心的

translation.en: We'll do the bus. You're gonna love the bus!
translation.zh: -巴士 我们会喜欢的-巴士

translation.en: [woman] Hey! Hey, Gonzales. Where is our welcome glass of champagne?
translation.zh: 嘿 冈萨雷斯 我们的欢迎香槟呢？

translation.en: -We were promised... -[child] Summer hit me!
translation.zh: -宣传册里写的-爸爸 萨莫撞到我了

translation.en: [woman] ...a glass of champagne when we arrived...
translation.zh: 我们一着陆就有欢迎香槟的

translation.en: [man] Zip it! Both of you! Will you stop that?
translation.zh: 我们一着陆就有欢迎香槟的 闭嘴！你们俩！能不能安静点？

translation.en: I know you hear me!
translation.zh: -我知道你听到我了-她总推我

translation.en: [man] Shut up!
translation.zh: -是-闭嘴！

translation.en: Let's do the-- We'll do the yacht, okay?
translation.zh: 我们去游艇 好吗？

translation.en: -Thank you. -All right.
translation.zh: -谢谢-好吧

translation.en: Cavendish!
translation.zh: 卡文迪什 我们改主意了

translation.en: We've changed our minds. We're gonna come.
translation.zh: 卡文迪什 我们改主意了 我们去

translation.en: Splendid.
translation.zh: 太好了

translation.en: -[Audrey] Hello. -Bienvenidos.
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: -Thank you. -De nada.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: -This is amazing. -Señor.
translation.zh: 太棒了

translation.en: I thought it was gonna be bigger.
translation.zh: 我还以为很大呢

translation.en: -[Audrey] What? -I did.
translation.zh: -什么？-真的

translation.en: -[Audrey] Bigger than this? -I really did.
translation.zh: -这还不大？-我真那么想

translation.en: I bet that's Cavendish's ex-fiancée who left him for his uncle.
translation.zh: 我猜那位就是卡文迪什的前未婚妻她为了他叔叔抛弃了他

translation.en: Oh, okay. I'm starving. Where's that Maurice dude?
translation.zh: 哦 好吧 我都饿死了莫瑞斯那家伙呢？

translation.en: Uh, I don't think we're supposed to talk to him directly.
translation.zh: 我想我们不可能直接见到他

translation.en: -Let's wait for dinner. -Which is when?
translation.zh: -我们等着吃晚饭吧-什么时候开饭？

translation.en: I don't-- Honey, it's later. I don't know. It's Europe, okay?
translation.zh: 我不…亲爱的 晚些时候吧我不知道 这里是欧洲好吧？

translation.en: The bus observes a standard American dinnertime, so...
translation.zh: 巴士都是标准美国晚餐时间开饭的

translation.en: [Audrey] Oh, baby, this is like a painting.
translation.zh: -哦 宝贝儿 美得像一幅画啊-嗯

translation.en: -[Nick] No, it's nice-- -[Audrey] It just doesn't look real.
translation.zh: -不 还好啦-一切都不像是真的

translation.en: -[Nick] It's-- -[Audrey] Oh, my God!
translation.zh: -是…-哦 我的天哪

translation.en: Wow. Look. She's so pretty.
translation.zh: 哇哦 看 她真漂亮

translation.en: -[Nick] Very pretty. -She's that kind of pretty
translation.zh: 非常漂亮 她那么漂亮

translation.en: that you don't really know what country she's from.
translation.zh: 甚至让你看不出她是哪国的

translation.en: I mean, I can't tell. Can you tell?
translation.zh: 我是说 我看不出 你能看出吗？

translation.en: Japan.
translation.zh: 日本

translation.en: Ah, yes, yes. You see? See? She can hear you.
translation.zh: 是 看到了吧？她能听到你

translation.en: She's not a-- not on television right now.
translation.zh: 现在她不是电视里的

translation.en: -You're watching a real person. -Shh.
translation.zh: 你眼前的是个真人

translation.en: Crashing the party with civilians.
translation.zh: 和平民来砸场子

translation.en: Are you drunk?
translation.zh: 你喝多了？

translation.en: It's only noon, Suzi, darling.
translation.zh: 这才中午 苏子 亲爱的

translation.en: Of course I'm drunk.
translation.zh: 当然我喝多了

translation.en: So, where is your beloved, Sir Liver Spots?
translation.zh: 怎么不见你那心爱的老年斑先生？

translation.en: Malcolm is not here yet. You know how he likes to make an entrance.
translation.zh: 马尔科姆还没来你知道他总喜欢隆重入场

translation.en: You'd know more about Malcolm's entrances than anyone at this point.
translation.zh: 现在你比谁都更清楚马尔科姆的入场方式了

translation.en: -Great to meet you. You're terrific. -Nice to meet you. Pleasure.
translation.zh: -很高兴见到你 你真漂亮-很高兴见到你 幸会

translation.en: [clears throat] I'm sorry you had to see that.
translation.zh: 抱歉让你们见笑了

translation.en: -Actually, I started to like you. -She deserved that.
translation.zh: -我开始有点喜欢你了-她应得的

translation.en: -Very good. You came on strong. -She is not nice. You're hurt.
translation.zh: -很好 你立场坚定-是她不好 -尤其是她伤害了你-查尔斯

translation.en: Charles.
translation.zh: -尤其是她伤害了你-查尔斯

translation.en: So glad you could make it.
translation.zh: 真高兴你能来

translation.en: And you brought guests.
translation.zh: 还带了客人来

translation.en: Allow me to introduce my cousin, Tobey.
translation.zh: 我来介绍我的表哥托比

translation.en: Malcolm's only son and the man Suzi would have left me for,
translation.zh: 马尔科姆的独生子如果他不是同志的话

translation.en: had he not been a screaming queen.
translation.zh: 苏子也会为了他抛弃我的

translation.en: -[Nick] Okay. -Thank you for having us aboard, sir.
translation.zh: -好-谢谢你让我们登船 先生

translation.en: Yeah. Hey, really nice.
translation.zh: 是 嘿 非常感谢

translation.en: It's my father's boat.
translation.zh: 是我父亲的船

translation.en: Oh, well, her father, uh, let me use his lawnmower one time,
translation.zh: -那她呢？-真幸运 她父亲有一次让我用他的割草机

translation.en: -so I know how that goes. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -所以我明白是什么感受-对

translation.en: How do you know Charles?

translation.zh: 天哪

translation.en: Nick's grandmother gave us a toaster from Sears.
translation.zh: 尼克奶奶给过我们一台在西尔斯买的面包机

translation.en: [chuckles] So the legend says.
translation.zh: 传说如此

translation.en: Oh, look. -[thud] -Here comes Daddy.
translation.zh: 哦 看哪 老爸来了

translation.en: What's that?
translation.zh: 那是什么？

translation.en: Captain Wong,
translation.zh: 王船长

translation.en: I'd like to address my guests privately.
translation.zh: 我想和客人们私下说几句

translation.en: Certainly.
translation.zh: 是

translation.en: My friends,
translation.zh: 朋友们

translation.en: welcome to the Mediterranean Queen.
translation.zh: 欢迎来到“地中海女王”号

translation.en: I can't tell you how much it warms my heart that you have made this trip here
translation.zh: 各位今天能来庆祝我的婚礼

translation.en: to celebrate my nuptials.
translation.zh: 我非常高兴

translation.en: You will find, as you get older,
translation.zh: 你们都会发现 随着年龄的增长

translation.en: that you begin to take stock of life.
translation.zh: 你会开始估量你的人生

translation.en: Not just where you've succeeded,
translation.zh: 不只是关于成功

translation.en: but where you've failed.
translation.zh: 而且也关乎失败

translation.en: Who... you've failed.
translation.zh: 还有那些你曾让他们失望的人

translation.en: Suzi, my darling bride,
translation.zh: 苏子 我亲爱的新娘

translation.en: who has so much of her life ahead of her.
translation.zh: 她的人生前路如花似锦

translation.en: Grace, who shines so brightly on the silver screen.
translation.zh: 格蕾丝 她在银屏上光芒万丈

translation.en: Juan Carlos, my godson,
translation.zh: 我的教子胡安卡洛斯

translation.en: who strives to lead my race team to victory.
translation.zh: 带领我的赛车队一路凯旋

translation.en: You--
translation.zh: 你们…

translation.en: Who are you?
translation.zh: 你们是谁？

translation.en: -Oh. Hey. We're the Spitzes. -We're the--
translation.zh: -哦 嘿 我们是斯皮茨夫妇-我们…

translation.en: The who?
translation.zh: 谁？

translation.en: Uh, I'm Audrey, and Nick Spitz.
translation.zh: 我是奥德丽 这是尼克斯皮茨

translation.en: -Great. -We love the boat.
translation.zh: -很好-我们喜欢这艘船

translation.en: -A boat? I mean, this is a ship. -It's beyond.
translation.zh: -嘿 船？要我说 是轮船-不止

translation.en: -Never seen anything like this. -Eric Lamonsoff has a boat.
translation.zh: -我从没见过这样的-埃里克有艘船

translation.en: We go fishing. He's got a Boston Whaler.
translation.zh: 我们一起钓鱼他那艘是波士顿捕鲸船

translation.en: This is gigantic.
translation.zh: -这艘太大了-不 他…

translation.en: They're my guests, Uncle.
translation.zh: 他们是我的客人 叔叔

translation.en: You brought guests?
translation.zh: 你带了客人来？

translation.en: Well, you did take my plus-one.
translation.zh: 是 您不是也留下了我带来的那位

translation.en: I'm so sorry. Would you like us to leave?
translation.zh: 对不起 您想让我们离开吗？

translation.en: We could-- I don't know how we're getting out of here, though.
translation.zh: 我们可以…不过我不知道怎么离开

translation.en: We're-- We're out to sea. Is there an Uber for boats?
translation.zh: 我们在海上 优步在这边有船吗？

translation.en: -Out-- Out of the room, Nick. -Out of the room?
translation.zh: -出去吧 尼克-出去？

translation.en: We can go out of the room, absolutely-- No.
translation.zh: -我们可以出去 当然…-不

translation.en: That won't be necessary.
translation.zh: 不必了

translation.en: -Okay. So we'll stick around. -So we stay. Okay.
translation.zh: -好吧 那我们就不走-那我们留下 好吧

translation.en: My nephew, Charles, who always finds a way to keep me on my toes.
translation.zh: 我侄子查尔斯总能让我保持警惕

translation.en: My friend, the Colonel, who's kept me safe these many years.
translation.zh: 我的上校老朋友 护我周全这么多年

translation.en: Vikram, whose family fortunes have always been intertwined with my own.
translation.zh: 维克拉姆他家的财富可以和我家相匹敌

translation.en: And my Tobias.
translation.zh: 还有我儿子托比

translation.en: All I ever wanted was a son, and here you are.
translation.zh: 我一直想要个儿子 就有了你

translation.en: My boy.
translation.zh: 我的儿子

translation.en: I've spoken to all of you about your position in my will.
translation.zh: 我已经说过你们每个人在我遗嘱里的位置了

translation.en: I have thought long and hard about what each of you is truly worth,
translation.zh: 我冥思苦想很长时间想决定你们每个人应该得到的

translation.en: and I've come to this conclusion.
translation.zh: 我最终得出结论

translation.en: You are all leeches.
translation.zh: 你们都是吸血虫

translation.en: Repugnant. Blood fat.
translation.zh: 肮脏恶心的贪心鬼

translation.en: Suckling on the tit of my good work for so many years.
translation.zh: 这么多年来都在榨取我辛勤的血汗

translation.en: You repulse me.
translation.zh: 你们让我恶心

translation.en: [under breath] Can't get this on a bus, baby.
translation.zh: 在巴士上可看不到这些 宝贝儿

translation.en: -This is incredible. -I know it.
translation.zh: -太不可思议了-我知道

translation.en: -Thank you. -You're welcome.
translation.zh: -谢谢你-不客气

translation.en: [Malcolm] Which is why I have drafted a new will.
translation.zh: 所以我起草了一份新遗嘱

translation.en: It states that my entire fortune goes to Suzi.
translation.zh: 其中写明我全部的财富归苏子所有

translation.en: [Malcolm] From this moment forth,
translation.zh: 此时此刻起

translation.en: you are all cut off.
translation.zh: 和你们都没关系了

translation.en: Abandoned. And perhaps, after I've done you this kindness,
translation.zh: 你们都自谋生路吧或许我这么做还能帮助你们

translation.en: you will finally be able to make something of yourselves... on your own.
translation.zh: 逼迫你们自己去打拼去收获

translation.en: Apparently, she's had enough of my caviar.
translation.zh: 显然 她已经吃了我很多鱼子酱了

translation.en: -That was funny. -Shh.
translation.zh: 太好笑了

translation.en: [Malcolm] Darling.
translation.zh: 亲爱的

translation.en: [Charles] You could've signed this at home.
translation.zh: 你们可以在家签完就行

translation.en: Instead, you called us here to humiliate us?
translation.zh: 却非要把我们都叫来羞辱一番？

translation.en: [Malcolm] Yes, and you came running.
translation.zh: 是 你们还屁颠屁颠地跑来了

translation.en: Father, don't do this.
translation.zh: 父亲 别这样

translation.en: Or what?
translation.zh: 要不哪样？

translation.en: [Malcolm] Yes.
translation.zh: 是

translation.en: That's what I thought.
translation.zh: 正如我所料

translation.en: [Vik] Don't shoot me! Don't shoot me, please!
translation.zh: 别朝我开枪！别朝我开枪！

translation.en: -Daddy! -[screams]
translation.zh: 爸！

translation.en: You shot him!
translation.zh: 你开枪打死了他！

translation.en: No! I saw someone stab him.
translation.zh: 不 我看到有人捅死了他

translation.en: -Who? -I don't know.
translation.zh: -谁？-不知道

translation.en: What happened? I heard a scr--
translation.zh: 怎么回事？我听到尖叫…

translation.en: Malcolm!
translation.zh: 马尔科姆！

translation.en: Oh, God!
translation.zh: 哦 天哪！

translation.en: Has anybody tried to revive him?
translation.zh: 有没有人帮他心肺复苏？

translation.en: He's got a knife plunged in his heart. I don't think he's revivable.
translation.zh: 他心脏插了把刀我想心肺复苏也没用了

translation.en: Should we pull it out?
translation.zh: 应该把它拔出来吗？

translation.en: No. It's a foot-long knife. It's just like pulling--
translation.zh: 不行 三十多厘米的刀 要拔就像…

translation.en: Oh, God!
translation.zh: 哦 天哪！

translation.en: Wow! You should have left the knife in for the po-po, Colonel, man!
translation.zh: 你应该留着刀让警察来处理 上校

translation.en: -I'll put it back. -Don't put it back.
translation.zh: -那我插回去-别插回去

translation.en: Oh! Will you listen to my husband? He's a detective.
translation.zh: 哦 天…能不能听我丈夫的？他是警探

translation.en: Yes, yes. What should we do, Mr. Officer?
translation.zh: 是 我们该怎么办 警官先生？

translation.en: Well, for starters, let's stop removing and reinserting the murder weapon
translation.zh: 首先 我们别再从受害者胸脯

translation.en: into the victim's chest.
translation.zh: 拔插凶器了

translation.en: In fact, let's stop touching the body altogether.
translation.zh: 实际上大家所有人都不能再碰触尸体了

translation.en: He was gonna take it all away.
translation.zh: 他一分都不打算给我们留

translation.en: For you.
translation.zh: 就为了你

translation.en: [Vik] Yo...
translation.zh: 哟

translation.en: Did he sign it?
translation.zh: 他签了吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: Yes!
translation.zh: 那就好

translation.en: We should make sure he doesn't have another copy on him.
translation.zh: 我们应该确保他身上没有另一份了

translation.en: Rifling through the pockets of the corpse counts as touching, yup.
translation.zh: 翻找尸体口袋也算碰触

translation.en: Sorry to single you out like that, Ms. Ballard. You're wonderful.
translation.zh: 是 对不起妨碍你了 巴拉德小姐 你真漂亮 你今晚真是流光溢彩

translation.en: -You look extravagant tonight. -[Audrey] Okay. What's next?
translation.zh: 你真漂亮 你今晚真是流光溢彩 好吧 接下来怎么办？

translation.en: We have to preserve the crime scene.
translation.zh: 我们要保护犯罪现场

translation.en: Captain Wong, is there any way you can lock off this place?
translation.zh: 王船长 你可以封锁这个地方吗？

translation.en: Yes, of course.
translation.zh: 好 当然可以

translation.en: So we should then start questioning the suspects.
translation.zh: 我们应该开始审问嫌疑人了吗？

translation.en: Suspects?
translation.zh: 嫌疑人？

translation.en: We're not questioning anybody.
translation.zh: 我们谁也不审问

translation.en: Wong, when you finish locking up here, you bring me the key.
translation.zh: 王 你封锁现场完毕后 把钥匙给我

translation.en: Then you radio Interpol, tell 'em we'll meet 'em at the docks in Monaco.
translation.zh: 然后你无线电联系国际刑警组织告诉他们在摩纳哥码头汇合

translation.en: In the meantime, I'm gonna check the shrimp out a little closer.
translation.zh: 同时 我要近一点去看看那些虾了

translation.en: For the investigation?
translation.zh: 为了调查？

translation.en: No, Wong, because I'm hungry as shit.
translation.zh: 不是 王 是我快饿死了

translation.en: The rest of you, I'd lock yourselves in your chambers or your yacht rooms
translation.zh: 剩下你们还是自己回去待在自己的舱室里吧

translation.en: because one of us...
translation.zh: 因为我们其中的一个人

translation.en: is a murderer.
translation.zh: 是杀人凶手

translation.en: -Audrey. -Yeah?
translation.zh: -奥德丽-嗯？

translation.en: Get the cocktail sauce.
translation.zh: 拿沙司来

translation.en: Yep.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Wait a second. What on earth is on these?
translation.zh: 等一下 这上面到底是什么？

translation.en: I don't know. This Maurice guy must breastfeed each shrimp individually.
translation.zh: 我不知道 那个莫瑞斯肯定给每条虾都母乳喂养了

translation.en: I mean, they live so well.
translation.zh: 我是说 它们都太新鲜了

translation.en: -Oh, God, yeah. -God.
translation.zh: -哦 天哪 没错-我的天

translation.en: All right. Where were we? Okay, okay, okay.
translation.zh: 好了 我们说到哪儿了？好了

translation.en: You know what? There had to be two people in on the killing.
translation.zh: 知道吗？肯定是两个人合谋的

translation.en: Because how could they know when the lights were gonna go out?
translation.zh: 因为要不他们怎么知道正好那时候灯会灭？

translation.en: -That's smart, that's smart. -Right?
translation.zh: -聪明-对吧？

translation.en: I'm tired as hell right now. I'm gonna go to sleep.
translation.zh: 我现在太困了 我要去睡了

translation.en: -Are you kidding me? -What?
translation.zh: -你开什么玩笑？-怎么？

translation.en: You're not jet-lagged?
translation.zh: 你没觉得有时差？

translation.en: -Nick. -[groans]
translation.zh: 尼克

translation.en: -Honey, come on, seriously. -Huh?
translation.zh: 亲爱的 说说 真的

translation.en: Who do you think did it?
translation.zh: 你觉得是谁干的？

translation.en: I don't think. I know.
translation.zh: 我不觉得 我知道

translation.en: Who?
translation.zh: 谁？

translation.en: It was the son.
translation.zh: 是他儿子

translation.en: -Tobey. -No.
translation.zh: -托比-不

translation.en: No way. Not a chance. It's too obvious.
translation.zh: 不可能 绝对不可能 那太明显了

translation.en: The most obvious suspect is never, never the killer.
translation.zh: 最明显的嫌疑人从来都不是凶手

translation.en: The most obvious suspect is always the killer.
translation.zh: 最明显的嫌疑人从来都是凶手

translation.en: When a wife gets killed, 90% of the time it was the husband.
translation.zh: 妻子被杀 凶手90%都是丈夫

translation.en: Why did you just use that as an example?
translation.zh: 你为什么要举这个例子？

translation.en: And I disagree.
translation.zh: 我不同意

translation.en: I think people are more complicated than that.
translation.zh: 我觉得人的思维没那么简单

translation.en: Judging off of what? Those books that you read?
translation.zh: 根据是什么 你读的那些书？

translation.en: People are simple, okay? It was Tobey.
translation.zh: 人都很简单 知道吧？就是托比

translation.en: He had the most to gain, and he also had the most to lose.
translation.zh: 受益最大的是他 损失最大的也是他

translation.en: Which is exactly why he's not the killer.
translation.zh: 所以他才不是凶手

translation.en: Did you ever fool around on a boat?
translation.zh: 你有没有在船上那个过？

translation.en: Do you know how much fun that could be?
translation.zh: 知道有多好玩吗？

translation.en: I just lay here and the boat does all the work.
translation.zh: 我只要躺着 让船来干活就行了

translation.en: -That's so convenient for you. -You know I have a bad back.
translation.zh: -好极了 倒是便宜你了-你知道我背不好

translation.en: So convenient for you.
translation.zh: 倒是便宜你了

translation.en: What about the lights?
translation.zh: 灯怎么说？

translation.en: Yeah, leave 'em on. I don't care. Either way. Lady's choice.
translation.zh: 开着就行我不介意 关了也行 都随你

translation.en: Shh! No. Who turned out those lights?
translation.zh: 不是 谁把灯关了？

translation.en: What?! Oh!
translation.zh: 怎么回事？

translation.en: Don't look at me like that. I can feel it.
translation.zh: 别那种眼神看我 我能感觉到的

translation.en: -I'm sorry. Excuse me. -Will you take the Allegra?
translation.zh: 对不起 嘿 吃点非索非那定吧 一样的东西

translation.en: It's the same stuff.
translation.zh: 嘿 吃点非索非那定吧 一样的东西

translation.en: -I don't want to talk about it. -Oh, God.
translation.zh: -我不想说这个-哦 天哪

translation.en: [Audrey] Enter the brilliant yet tortured detective,
translation.zh: 优秀的警探一筹莫展

translation.en: right on cue.
translation.zh: 朝着队列过来了

translation.en: [man] Mesdames, messieurs.
translation.zh: 女士们先生们

translation.en: My name is Inspector Laurent Delacroix.
translation.zh: 我是劳伦特德拉克洛瓦督察

translation.en: I will now summon you one by one to the grand lounge for questioning.
translation.zh: 我现在一个一个叫你们到大休息厅里问话

translation.en: Why is that smoke ring so good? How did he do that?
translation.zh: 他吐的眼圈怎么那么好？怎么弄的？

translation.en: Oh, you broke it. You broke it.
translation.zh: 你弄破了

translation.en: Tell me about Malcolm Quince.
translation.zh: 和我说说马尔科姆肯斯

translation.en: He was the most wonderful--
translation.zh: 他是最棒的…

translation.en: Swine.
translation.zh: 猪

translation.en: He was the love of my life.
translation.zh: 他是我的一生挚爱

translation.en: He was a complicated man.
translation.zh: 他是个很复杂的人

translation.en: Describe to me what happened.
translation.zh: 描述一下当时发生的事

translation.en: Yo, Mr. French Policeman, man. It was mad. Lights went out.
translation.zh: 哟 法国警察先生我滴神哦 简直太疯狂了 一下子灯都灭了

translation.en: [Colonel] I thought I saw something move, and I shot.
translation.zh: 我想我看到有什么在动 我就开枪了

translation.en: Yes. Finish line.
translation.zh: 是 终点线

translation.en: The old man got what was coming to him.
translation.zh: 那老家伙死有余辜

translation.en: One-eight-seven, motherfu--
translation.zh: 一啊八啊七啊 操他妈…

translation.en: Did anyone touch the body?
translation.zh: 有人碰过尸体吗？

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 没有

translation.en: And did you notice anything else out of the ordinary?
translation.zh: 你有没有看到谁很反常？

translation.en: -[all] The Americans. -Yes, number one. Yes.
translation.zh: -那两个美国人-对 头号反常 没错

translation.en: [Audrey] Aren't you gonna, um...
translation.zh: 你们不用…

translation.en: Aren't you gonna separate us?
translation.zh: 分开我们俩吗？

translation.en: Pardon?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: -For the interrogation. -[Nick] Okay.
translation.zh: -审问啊-好了

translation.en: Question us separately, see if our...
translation.zh: -就是分开审问我们…-你在干什么？

translation.en: -What are you doing? -...answers match.
translation.zh: -…看我们的回答一不一样-比如…

translation.en: What? I'm just saying, our answers will match
translation.zh: -好吧-什么？我只是说 我们的回答肯定一样因为我们是无辜的

translation.en: -because we're innocent. -Yeah, that's right.
translation.zh: 我们的回答肯定一样因为我们是无辜的 对 没错

translation.en: There we go. God, you are really good at that. [chuckles]
translation.zh: -我们好了-天哪 你真的很会吐圈圈

translation.en: We found this in Tobey Quince's suite.
translation.zh: 我们在托比肯斯的西装里发现了这个

translation.en: A typewritten suicide note
translation.zh: 打印的自杀遗书

translation.en: in which he confesses to the murder of his father.
translation.zh: 他在里面坦白了杀害他父亲的凶手

translation.en: Typewritten? -Mm-mm. -That's not very common.
translation.zh: 打印的？这可不常见

translation.en: -Very suspicious. -[Nick] Yes.
translation.zh: -非常可疑-对

translation.en: Yeah, obviously someone is trying to frame Tobey for his father's murder.
translation.zh: 是 显然是有人打印陷害托比杀害了他父亲

translation.en: -[Audrey] This is amazing. -[Nick] Look how excited she is.
translation.zh: -我觉得真是太刺激了-这让我很兴奋

translation.en: So where's your head at with this whole thing?
translation.zh: 你们整件事的矛头对准谁？

translation.en: I mean, who are your chief suspects?
translation.zh: 我是说 谁是你们的头号嫌疑人？

translation.en: You.
translation.zh: 你

translation.en: -Woo, yes. -Right, of course,
translation.zh: -是-对 当然了

translation.en: -'cause everybody is a suspect. -Especially her. [laughs]
translation.zh: -因为大家都有嫌疑-尤其是她

translation.en: This is a group of friends and family who have known each other for years.
translation.zh: 他们都是多年的朋友和家人

translation.en: You two show up, and ten hours later, two of them are dead.
translation.zh: 你们两个才来了十小时他们当中就死了两个

translation.en: Coincidence?
translation.zh: 是巧合？

translation.en: -Yes. -Absolutely.
translation.zh: -对-绝对的

translation.en: -Coincidence. -Wait. Excuse me.
translation.zh: -巧合-等等 你说什么

translation.en: Are you saying that your theory
translation.zh: 你是说 你认为

translation.en: is that the two of us conned our way onto a stranger's boat at the last minute
translation.zh: 我们俩在最后时刻骗上了陌生人的船

translation.en: to commit premeditated murder that benefits us in no way?
translation.zh: 预谋策划了一起对我们毫无益处的谋杀？

translation.en: That's your theory?
translation.zh: 你就是这么想的？

translation.en: Perhaps someone paid you to do it.
translation.zh: 或许你们受雇于谁

translation.en: -No. -Paid us to do it? [laughs]
translation.zh: -不-受雇杀人？

translation.en: Oh, my gosh. I would love to see that. Show me that money.
translation.zh: 哦 我的天哪 我还真想那样那笔钱给我啊

translation.en: [Audrey] Do you want to see our bank statements?
translation.zh: -是-我们没有… 你想查查我们的银行对账单？我们一穷二白

translation.en: [stammers] We're broke.
translation.zh: 你想查查我们的银行对账单？我们一穷二白

translation.en: Desperate for money. I see.
