translation.zh: 马德琳勒巴特利雷

translation.en: The most beautiful woman I have ever seen.
translation.zh: 我见过的最漂亮的女人

translation.en: She was the Colonel's fiancée when the bomb exploded.
translation.zh: 爆炸之前她是上校的未婚妻

translation.en: And when he awoke...
translation.zh: 等他醒来后

translation.en: she was Mr. Quince's wife.
translation.zh: 她已经是肯斯夫人了

translation.en: What the hell is with this guy?
translation.zh: 这家伙到底是怎么回事？

translation.en: -What, honestly, is his problem? -Can he get his own woman maybe once?
translation.zh: -他就不能有一次自己找一个？-什么 老实说 他是不是有问题？

translation.en: And then she died.
translation.zh: 然后她死了

translation.en: -No! -[Nick groans]
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: In childbirth.
translation.zh: 难产死的

translation.en: -No! -Damn.
translation.zh: -不-见鬼

translation.en: The child died, too. A boy.
translation.zh: 孩子也死了 是个男孩

translation.en: A boy who would have inherited it all.
translation.zh: 本来可以继承这一切的男孩

translation.en: After that, the Colonel never mentioned Madeleine again,
translation.zh: 从那以后 上校再也没提起过马德琳

translation.en: except for one night.
translation.zh: 除了那一晚

translation.en: On the anniversary of her death,
translation.zh: 那是有一年她的忌日

translation.en: he came to me, he was drinking. He say...
translation.zh: 上校喝着酒来找我 他说

translation.en: "Sergei."
translation.zh: “谢尔盖”

translation.en: He's doing impressions now.
translation.zh: 他开始绘声绘色了

translation.en: "If you were to kill this Mr. Quince, how would you do it?"
translation.zh: “如果你想杀了肯斯 你会怎么做？”

translation.en: And I say,
translation.zh: 我就说

translation.en: "Find isolated place, create confusion,
translation.zh: “找个偏僻的地方 制造混乱

translation.en: make sure there are others with motive."
translation.zh: 让其他人都有动机”

translation.en: I told him how to kill the man!
translation.zh: 是我教他怎么杀了那家伙

translation.en: -Holy shit! This is incredible! -Thank you.
translation.zh: -老天爷！这也太不可思议了-谢谢你

translation.en: Okay. So the Colonel killed Malcolm and Tobey over lost love.
translation.zh: 好 就是说上校为了旧爱杀了马尔科姆和托比

translation.en: -Got it. Perfect. -This is insane.
translation.zh: -明白了 都清楚了-这也太疯狂了

translation.en: Will you just say all of that one more time,
translation.zh: 你能再全部重复一遍吗

translation.en: but can you say it from the top?
translation.zh: -不过要从头开始？-她要…

translation.en: -I've gotta do a voice memo. -She screws this up a lot.
translation.zh: 我要留个语音记录 怎么弄？

translation.en: -Just ask Siri. -[Nick] Swipe it up.
translation.zh: -问语音助手Siri就行-上滑

translation.en: -Swipe it up. -I did swipe up.
translation.zh: -上滑-我上滑啦

translation.en: Say, "Siri, -I would like to make voice memo." -[overlapping chatter]
translation.zh: 你就说“Siri 我要录音”

translation.en: Get into wardrobe. You are in danger.
translation.zh: 藏到衣柜里去 你们有危险

translation.en: -Get in the wardrobe, you said? -You are in danger. Right now.
translation.zh: -你说藏到衣柜里？-你们很危险 快点

translation.en: -Quickly. -[Audrey] Jesus. I don't know-- Ow!
translation.zh: -快-天哪 我不知道…

translation.en: And whatever you hear, do not come out till I say so.
translation.zh: 不管听到什么没有我叫你们就别出来

translation.en: -Yes, sir. -Yes.
translation.zh: -是 先生-是

translation.en: [Sergei] You. What do you want?
translation.zh: 是你啊 你想干什么？

translation.en: No, they're not here. You should go.
translation.zh: 不 他们不在这儿 你走吧

translation.en: [whispering] Where's the lamp?
translation.zh: 灯呢？

translation.en: -I left it outside. -Why isn't it in here?
translation.zh: -在外面-为什么就不能拿进来？

translation.en: -Now you like the lamp? You're ridiculous. -Well, we needed--
translation.zh: -现在又喜欢那灯了？你太离谱了-不是 我们得有光…

translation.en: -[Audrey] Let me open the door. -[Nick] Wait, wait, wait!
translation.zh: 我开点柜门 等等

translation.en: Oh, thank God.
translation.zh: 哦 谢天谢地

translation.en: Killer... is...
translation.zh: 凶手是…

translation.en: [gasps] What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: [Audrey] Oh, God, no! No, no, no!
translation.zh: 哦 天哪 不！

translation.en: -[Nick groans] -Oh, my God!
translation.zh: 哦 老天爷！

translation.en: Is he dead? Is he dead?
translation.zh: 他死了？

translation.en: He's dead!
translation.zh: 他死了

translation.en: Do we call housekeeping?
translation.zh: 我们要叫人打扫吗？

translation.en: -[pounding on door] -Oh! Honey! -[Nick] Oh, my God! -[screaming]
translation.zh: -哦 我的天！-哦！亲爱的 当心！

translation.en: Lock the door!
translation.zh: 锁上门！

translation.en: [Audrey] Oh, God! -[Nick yells] -Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 哦 天哪 老天爷啊

translation.en: Go! Out of the window!
translation.zh: -走 走窗户-哦 天哪

translation.en: -[thudding on door] -[Audrey] What are you doing?
translation.zh: -走 走窗户-哦 天哪 哦 老天爷 你要干什么？亲爱的

translation.en: [Nick] Okay, there's a ledge.
translation.zh: 好了 这里有个窗台

translation.en: That's not a ledge, that's an edge!
translation.zh: 那个不是窗台 只是一截小边

translation.en: -[Nick] Here we go. -[Audrey] Oh, my God.
translation.zh: -好了-哦 我的天哪 好了 我保护你有我在 百分之百 慢点

translation.en: [Nick] I gotcha, a hundred percent. A hundred percent. Slow.
translation.zh: 好了 我保护你有我在 百分之百 慢点

translation.en: -[Nick] Oh, right there. -No! Oh, God.
translation.zh: -哦 就是这里-不 哦 天哪

translation.en: [Nick] Come on. -Don't even look down. -Oh!
translation.zh: 来 别往下看

translation.en: -Don't look down. -Oh, my God!
translation.zh: -别往下看-哦 我的天哪

translation.en: -Told you not to look down. -It's so far.
translation.zh: -告诉你了 别往下看-太远了

translation.en: -[Nick] Oh, my God. -[yelps]
translation.zh: 哦 我的天哪

translation.en: -[Nick] He flosses angrier than you! -[screaming]
translation.zh: 他剔牙剔得比你还凶

translation.en: [Nick] We got an empty room. Jackpot. -Okay, we're gonna get up on this letter. -Okay.
translation.zh: 我们找到一间空房 头奖啊好了 我们进去

translation.en: Ready? Go. [straining]
translation.zh: 准备好了吗？走

translation.en: Oh, my God!
translation.zh: 哦 我的天哪！

translation.en: -You okay? Come on. -That was the scariest thing.
translation.zh: -你没事吧？起来-这是最恐怖的事了

translation.en: -We gotta go. All right. I love you. -Oh, my God.
translation.zh: -我们得离开 好了 我爱你-哦 我的天哪

translation.en: -I love you. I'm so scared. -Let's go, let's go, let's go.
translation.zh: -我爱你 我好怕-我们走

translation.en: No, you're not going back out there.
translation.zh: 不 不能走那儿了

translation.en: -[Grace] Oh, yes! Finally! -Come here.
translation.zh: -哦 耶！终于好了！-过来

translation.en: -Kiss me, Vik. -Oh!
translation.zh: 吻我 维克

translation.en: Oh, kiss me. Kiss me here.
translation.zh: 哦 吻我 吻我这里

translation.en: -Where? -Here.
translation.zh: -哪里？-这里

translation.en: -God, I love it. Quick, get me to the bed. -Jesus Christ.
translation.zh: -天哪 我喜欢 快 抱我上床-苍天啊

translation.en: -Get up. -Yes!
translation.zh: -起来-好

translation.en: [stammering] I'm gonna drink you up like a milkshake without a straw!
translation.zh: 我要像不用吸管喝奶昔一样吸干你

translation.en: Yeah. Wow!
translation.zh: 耶 哇哦！

translation.en: -[Vik] That's right. -Vanilla milkshake!
translation.zh: -就这样-香草奶昔

translation.en: [Vik] Vanilla, chocolate, whatever!
translation.zh: 香草奶昔 巧克力奶昔 什么都行

translation.en: -Yeah! -Yeah!
-Here we go! -Wow!
translation.zh: -我来了-哇哦！

translation.en: [Vik] Yeah! I hope the hotel's got insurance for these springs
translation.zh: 希望酒店给这些弹簧投过保险了

translation.en: 'cause I'm gonna bust this bed up.
translation.zh: 因为我要大闹天宫了

translation.en: [Grace] Oh, my God!
translation.zh: 哦 我的天哪！

translation.en: -You're much stronger than you look, Vik! -That's right!
translation.zh: -你比你外表还强壮-没错

translation.en: -[Vik] You ready for this? -I don't know if I am!
translation.zh: -你准备好了吗？-我不确定

translation.en: -[Vik moans] -[Grace] Oh, Grace!
translation.zh: 哦 格蕾丝

translation.en: -Grace! Oh, Grace! -Huh? Why do you keep saying Grace?
translation.zh: 格蕾丝 -哦 格蕾丝-为什么你不停地叫格蕾丝？

translation.en: Darling, it's the only thing that gets me in the mood.
translation.zh: 这是唯一能让我兴奋的一句

translation.en: [Grace] Grace! You look so good for your age!
translation.zh: 格蕾丝 你芳华正茂

translation.en: -[Vik] So good for your age! Oh, God! -[Grace] Your skin is beautiful!
translation.zh: -芳华正茂-你肌若凝脂

translation.en: -[Grace] You have no wrinkles... -No wrinkles any-- Anywhere!
translation.zh: -你肌肤一平如展-一平如展…

translation.en: Oh, my God! Grace, you're so--
translation.zh: 哦 我的天哪 格蕾丝 你真…

translation.en: Oh, God!
translation.zh: 哦 天哪！

translation.en: -[whispers] Uh-oh. -[Grace] Vik. Mm-hmm?
translation.zh: 维克

translation.en: What happened?
translation.zh: 怎么回事？

translation.en: [Vik] Maybe we should, like, conversate a little bit.
translation.zh: 或许我们应该稍微聊聊

translation.en: Get to know each other. Know what I mean?
translation.zh: 互相了解一下 你懂我的意思吧？

translation.en: Like, eye to eye, really connect. Tell me about your favorite band.
translation.zh: 比如说面对面心心相印和我说说你最喜欢哪个乐队

translation.en: [Grace] I'm going to the casino. Maybe I'll get lucky there.
translation.zh: 好吧 我要去赌场了或许在那儿我运气能好点

translation.en: Look, look, look! Please don't tell anybody about this
translation.zh: 听着 请不要告诉大家

translation.en: 'cause I've got some mad sex cred in these parts, yeah.
translation.zh: 因为我一向都以床上功夫著称 对

translation.en: [Vik] My people know me. I'll buy you a hat!
translation.zh: 大家都知道 我给你买帽子

translation.en: [Audrey] I can't believe this just happened.
translation.zh: 不敢相信还有这种事

translation.en: Okay, okay.
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: All right. We gotta calm down.
translation.zh: 好了 我们要冷静

translation.en: -This has been a really weird day, huh? -Yeah.
translation.zh: -今天真是奇怪的一天-是啊

translation.en: Okay. Let's just get out of this place.
translation.zh: 好了 我们快点离开吧

translation.en: Absolutely. Someplace with beer though, please.
translation.zh: 没错 找个有啤酒的地方

translation.en: "I'll go buy you a hat."
translation.zh: “我给你买帽子”

translation.en: [Nick] Sergei was trying to tell us the Colonel did it,
translation.zh: 谢尔盖想告诉我们上校是凶手

translation.en: but then he gets shot. There's no way the Colonel shot him
translation.zh: 但是他中弹了 不可能是上校开的枪

translation.en: 'cause the Colonel was having a floss party.
translation.zh: 因为上校当时在剔牙

translation.en: Did you see how crazy he was going with the teeth flossing?
translation.zh: 你看没看到他剔牙剔得有多狠？

translation.en: -I did. -What did he have in there? A buffet?
translation.zh: -看到了-他牙缝里有什么？自助餐厅吗？

translation.en: -Um... -Oh, my gosh.
translation.zh: 哦 我的天哪

translation.en: -What's he saying? -I don't know.
translation.zh: -他说什么？-我不知道

translation.en: Well, you took French in high school, didn't you?
translation.zh: 你不是中学学过法语吗？

translation.en: I don't remember high school! What did you take in high school?
translation.zh: 我连中学都不记得了！ -好吧-你中学学的什么？

translation.en: -Latin. -Oh, great. Who takes freakin' Latin?
translation.zh: -拉丁语-哦 太好了 谁还会学变态的拉丁？

translation.en: -People who have a hot Latin teacher. -Shh!
translation.zh: 拉丁语老师很漂亮

translation.en: Okay, so something, something...
translation.zh: 好了 他在说…

translation.en: Something cake. Something's frosted.
translation.zh: 什么蛋糕 什么结霜

translation.en: Okay. You're fired. You're fired.
translation.zh: 你下岗了

translation.en: -Okay, I told you-- -Excuse me, sir.
translation.zh: 打扰一下 先生

translation.en: Could you translate that for us, please? S'il vous plaît?
translation.zh: 能帮我们翻译一下吗？

translation.en: [in French accent] Uh, the TV says that, uh... you are the most wanted... for...
translation.zh: 电视上说你们是头号

translation.en: for meurtre.
translation.zh: 杀人通缉犯

translation.en: -No, no, no. -Okay, no, no. We...
translation.zh: -好吧 不 我们…-不对

translation.en: This is a complete misunderstanding, okay?
translation.zh: 这完全是误会 知道吗？

translation.en: We were just around... -We saw-- -...a lot of people that happened to die,
translation.zh: 我们只是和几个碰巧死了的人一起待过

translation.en: but we didn't murt.
translation.zh: -但我们没杀人-我们不是杀人犯

translation.en: You are to be arrested at first sight.
translation.zh: 你们一被发现立即逮捕

translation.en: -Us? -So, here's what we do.
translation.zh: -我们？-那 我们就这么干

translation.en: What are you talking about? What are you doing?
translation.zh: 你说什么？你要干什么？

translation.en: They can't track our SIM card now.
translation.zh: 现在他们不能追踪我们的SIM卡了

translation.en: Yeah, then pull the SIM card out.
translation.zh: 那你可以把SIM卡拔出来啊

translation.en: You don't just submerge our phones into a bucket of beer.
translation.zh: 不用把我们的手机都泡进啤酒里

translation.en: Now-- Now he's saying that madame is hairdresser,
translation.zh: 现在他说女士是发型师

translation.en: you are, uh... police officer?
translation.zh: 你是警察

translation.en: No, he's-- he's a detective.
translation.zh: 不 他是警探

translation.en: Ah. No, he's not.
translation.zh: 不 他不是

translation.en: -Yes, he is. -Yes, I am! Yes, I am!
translation.zh: -是 他是-是 我是

translation.en: No, no, no. He says that you have, uh, confessed to lying about that you are detective.
translation.zh: 不 他说你们谈过的 你谎称你是警探

translation.en: What? No. Now he's making stuff up.
translation.zh: 什么？不 他在胡诌八扯

translation.en: TV says you have failed your detective exam many, many times.
translation.zh: 电视里说你很多很多次都没通过警探考试

translation.en: All right! Enough translato. That's not--
translation.zh: 不用你翻译了 都不对…

translation.en: You're just improvising, pal, and it's getting weird.
translation.zh: 你在瞎编了 伙计 这也太离谱了

translation.en: What-- What is he talking about?
translation.zh: 怎么回事？他说的什么意思？

translation.en: [Delacroix] I will repeat this message in English.
translation.zh: 我再用英语重复一遍

translation.en: Nick Spitz... is many things, but not a detective.
translation.zh: 不管尼克斯皮茨是什么人反正他不是警探

translation.en: Well, I heard that.
translation.zh: 好了 我听到了

translation.en: Did you lie to me?
translation.zh: 你骗我的？

translation.en: I didn't-- I didn't lie.
translation.zh: 我没骗你

translation.en: -The guy-- The guy was-- -Oh, God. No, no, no.
translation.zh: -那家伙…那家伙在…-哦 天哪 不

translation.en: [Nick] Whoa. Hey.
translation.zh: -嘿-不

translation.en: -No. -Hun, hun, hun.
translation.zh: 别走

translation.en: This whole thing's just-- just very complicated.
translation.zh: 整件事都很复杂

translation.en: Complicated, yeah. I thought people were simple.
translation.zh: 复杂 是 我以为人都很简单

translation.en: [sighs] Audrey, please.
translation.zh: 奥德丽 听我说

translation.en: What? Did you lie about getting that raise, too?
translation.zh: 怎么？你说涨工资也是骗我的？

translation.en: [sighs] How are we affording this trip?
translation.zh: 那这次旅游你怎么负担得起？

translation.en: You made me feel like I had to take you on this honeymoon.
translation.zh: 你让我觉得我必须要带你来度蜜月

translation.en: You told me you already booked this honeymoon.
translation.zh: 你说你已经预定好了蜜月旅行

translation.en: You gave this to me. This was my anniversary gift.
translation.zh: 这是你给我的纪念日礼物

translation.en: -Okay. -You lied about that, too?
translation.zh: -好吧-你这也是骗人的？

translation.en: We'll get into all that, okay?
translation.zh: 我们晚点再谈这个好吗？

translation.en: But right now, I gotta figure out how we're gonna get out of this situation.
translation.zh: 但目前我的当务之急是想办法解决这件事

translation.en: You have to figure this out? What do you think I've been doing?
translation.zh: 你要想办法解决这件事？ 那你以为我一直都在干什么？

translation.en: This is what I do for a living, sweetheart!
translation.zh: 这是我的老本行 亲爱的

translation.en: You're a goddamn hairdresser!
translation.zh: 你只是个发型师

translation.en: -I'm sorry. -Whoa.
translation.zh: -哇哦-对不起

translation.en: -Where you going? -I need a minute.
translation.zh: -你要去哪里？-我想静一静

translation.en: -[police sirens wailing] -We don't have a minute!
translation.zh: -我们没时间了-别管我

translation.en: [Audrey] Just leave me alone. Don't you follow me.
translation.zh: -我们没时间了-别管我 别跟着我

translation.en: [Charles] You need to get out of Monte Carlo right away.
translation.zh: 你得马上离开蒙特卡洛

translation.en: I got you into this, I'll help get you out. Come with me.
translation.zh: 是我把你卷进来的我想送你出去 跟我走

translation.en: -[Charles] Now! We have to go. -[Audrey] Right.
translation.zh: -快点 我们必须离开-好吧

translation.en: -[Charles] Lake Como, back roads. -[driver] Yes, sir.
translation.zh: -科莫湖 走小路-是 先生

translation.en: -[Charles] Where's Nick? -I don't know. I don't care.
translation.zh: -尼克呢？-我不知道 我不管他了

translation.en: [Nick] Jimmy boy, it's Nick.
translation.zh: 吉米 是我 尼克

translation.en: Where are you? You guys are all over the news.
translation.zh: 你在哪里？新闻里都在报道你们

translation.en: They say you killed three people.
translation.zh: 说你们杀了三个人

translation.en: Do you think that's possible?
translation.zh: 你觉得可能吗？

translation.en: With your aim? Hell, no.
translation.zh: 就你那枪法？算了吧

translation.en: Exactly. Now I'm gonna text you two international numbers.
translation.zh: 没错 我现在发给你两个国际号码

translation.en: Can you link them together so I can follow one from the other?
translation.zh: 你能把两个连起来 让我监听吗？

translation.en: Are you trying to get my ass fired?
translation.zh: 你想让我丢掉工作吗？

translation.en: [sighs] But hell, yeah. Thank you.
translation.zh: -算了 好吧-谢谢

translation.en: There's one more thing I want you to check into for me.
translation.zh: 还有一件事帮我调查一下

translation.en: [Audrey] What are we doing?
translation.zh: 我们在干什么？

translation.en: I just have to dash in for a quick appointment with my lawyer.
translation.zh: 我要和我的律师简单见个面

translation.en: We're going to read Malcolm's will at the villa later on,
translation.zh: 稍后会在别墅里宣读马尔科姆的遗嘱

translation.en: and I'm going to get what's mine.
translation.zh: 我得保证能拿到属于自己的那份

translation.en: Charles, that just sounded very suspicious.
translation.zh: 查尔斯 你这样很可疑

translation.en: What about this week doesn't?
translation.zh: 这几天的事 有哪件不可疑？

translation.en: Oh, God.
translation.zh: 哦 天哪

translation.en: Oh, my God. Claritin.
translation.zh: 哦 氯雷他定

translation.en: This is Japanese Claritin.
translation.zh: 日本版的氯雷他定

translation.en: Hello?
translation.zh: 有人吗？

translation.en: Charles?
translation.zh: 查尔斯？

translation.en: Audrey!
translation.zh: 奥德丽！

translation.en: -[Audrey] Ow! -God!
translation.zh: 天哪！

translation.en: [Audrey] What the--
translation.zh: -怎么…-怎么…

translation.en: What are you doing here?
translation.zh: 你怎么在这儿？

translation.en: I followed Suzi here.
translation.zh: 我跟踪苏子来的

translation.en: -Suzi's here? -Yes.
translation.zh: -苏子来这儿了？-对

translation.en: Okay, Cavendish came here to find Suzi. I'm telling you, Cavendish is in on this.
translation.zh: 好吧 卡文迪什来这里是见苏子的我和你说 卡文迪什脱不了干系

translation.en: I know. I knew that!
translation.zh: 我知道 我早就知道

translation.en: Okay. I just found a box of Japanese Claritin
translation.zh: 对 我刚在卡文迪什的豪华轿车后座

translation.en: in the back of Cavendish's limo.
translation.zh: 找到一盒日本版的氯雷他定

translation.en: So what? They were planning this the whole damn time?
translation.zh: 所以呢？一直是他们合谋的？

translation.en: The whole time. This was their plan.
translation.zh: 一直 都是他们策划的

translation.en: -So they kill Malcolm, they kill Tobey... -Yeah.
translation.zh: -他们杀了马尔科姆 杀了托比-对

translation.en: ...before Malcolm has time to sign the new will.
translation.zh: 不让马尔科姆签署新遗嘱

translation.en: -Right. -That way, Cavendish inherits everything.
translation.zh: -对-那样卡文迪什就能继承全部遗产

translation.en: And he splits it with Suzi.
translation.zh: 再和苏子平分

translation.en: And if they killed him after, then Suzi would have inherited.
translation.zh: 如果他们在签完之后动手那苏子就是继承人

translation.en: -They still would have split that. -It was a win-win.
translation.zh: -他们还是可以平分-双赢啊

translation.en: Oh, look at that. Who figured that whole thing out?
translation.zh: 哦 看哪 是谁参透整件案子的？

translation.en: The hairdresser. Mm-mm. The hairdresser.
translation.zh: 发型师

translation.en: -[door closes] -[gasps]
translation.zh: 发型师

translation.en: -[Audrey yelps] -I got you!
translation.zh: -有我在 亲爱的-天哪！

translation.en: Jesus! Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 哦 我的天哪

translation.en: It's just like Death at the Library!
translation.zh: 真像《图书馆之死》的情节

translation.en: What happens in Death at the Library?
translation.zh: 《图书馆之死》里讲什么了？

translation.en: They died. That's why it's called Death at the Library.
translation.zh: 都死了 所以才叫《图书馆之死》

translation.en: Nick, what are you doing? [screams]
translation.zh: 尼克 你要干什么？

translation.en: We are going to push this over on the count of three,
translation.zh: 我们数到三 一起推倒书架

translation.en: -and then we're gonna run. -We're gonna what?
translation.zh: -然后就跑-要干什么？

translation.en: -Don't you trust me? -No!
translation.zh: -你还不信任我？-不信任！

translation.en: Ready? One!
translation.zh: 准备好了吗？一

translation.en: Two!
translation.zh: 二

translation.en: Three!
translation.zh: 三！

translation.en: Oh, look! There!
translation.zh: 哦 看！那边

translation.en: Oh! Sorry! Oh, my gosh. I am so sorry.
translation.zh: 哦！对不起！天哪 真对不起

translation.en: [Nick] Come on.
translation.zh: 快

translation.en: -Is that-- -Is that Juan Carlos?
translation.zh: -那是…-胡安卡洛斯？

translation.en: -Juan Carlos! -Hey!
translation.zh: -胡安卡洛斯！-嘿！

translation.en: Hello!
translation.zh: 你好

translation.en: -Juan Carlos! -How am I?
translation.zh: -胡安！-我怎么样？

translation.en: -No, no. Suzi! Suzi! -Suzi! Suzi! Which way is Suzi?
translation.zh: -不 苏子-苏子朝哪边跑了？

translation.en: -Married to Malcolm. -You two married! Good!
translation.zh: -嫁给马尔科姆的-你们两个结婚了！好耶

translation.en: -No! -No!
translation.zh: -是！-不对！

translation.en: -Yes! -Latin, baby!
translation.zh: 对 拉丁 宝贝儿！还是国际语言

translation.en: -Still the international language! -I got it!
translation.zh: 拉丁 宝贝儿！还是国际语言 好 我明白了 我们走

translation.en: [Audrey] Shit.
translation.zh: 该死

translation.en: -Oh! -Yeah!
translation.zh: -她在那儿-对！

translation.en: [Audrey] Where'd she go? She was right there.
translation.zh: 她去哪了？刚就在那儿的

translation.en: You should have never come to Lake Como.
translation.zh: 你们就不该来科莫湖

translation.en: -Wait a minute. -We know about you and Cavendish.
translation.zh: -等等 等一下-我们知道你和卡文迪什的事了

translation.en: -You know nothing. -[Audrey] We know you're still in love,
translation.zh: 你们什么都不知道 我们知道你们仍然彼此相爱

translation.en: and we know that love is tough without money.
translation.zh: 我们还知道有爱没有钱的艰辛

translation.en: Isn't it, Suzi?
translation.zh: 对吧 苏子？

translation.en: I'll take your word for it. You're the one whose shoes
translation.zh: 这话我信 你的鞋子上面还带着打折标签呢

translation.en: still got a sticker from Marshalls on it.
translation.zh: 你的鞋子上面还带着打折标签呢

translation.en: -They have name brands now! -[Audrey] How dare you? -They have name brands now! -How dare you?
translation.zh: -打折店里现在也有名牌了-你怎么敢？

translation.en: -[Nick] What? -These are from Target.
translation.zh: -怎么了？好吧-是塔吉特百货的

translation.en: -How could you not tell me? -I don't look at your--
translation.zh: 你怎么不告诉我鞋子上面还粘着标签？

translation.en: -Shut up! -[gasping]
translation.zh: -我没注意到你的鞋子-闭嘴！

translation.en: -Oh! -Suzi, don't. Please, don't do this.
translation.zh: 苏子 别这样 别 别这样

translation.en: No matter what you do, you're not gonna be safe. I'm telling you.
translation.zh: 不管怎么做 你都跑不了的 我告诉你

translation.en: One murderer always double-crosses the other murderer.
translation.zh: 杀人犯最后会死在杀人犯手里

translation.en: -She reads the books. -It's just a cliché of the genre!
translation.zh: -她读的书多-书上都是这么写的

translation.en: -I'm telling you! -[gasps]
translation.zh: 你听我说

translation.en: Hey! Halloween!
translation.zh: 嘿！万圣节！

translation.en: -[gasps] -[yelling] [Audrey] No, no, no! Oh, my God! Go, go, go!
translation.zh: 哦 天哪！快！快啊！

translation.en: Cavendish, you move, I'll blow your head off!
translation.zh: 卡文迪什 你再敢动我就爆了你的头

translation.en: Shoot at him!
translation.zh: 开枪打他！

translation.en: Oh, babe, you're the worst shot!
translation.zh: 哦 宝贝儿 你枪法太烂了！

translation.en: Those were warning shots, honey!
translation.zh: 我那只是警告 亲爱的

translation.en: -Oh, yes! I go fast! -Go!
translation.zh: -哦 对 我跑得快-快！

translation.en: Ambulance! Emergencia!
translation.zh: 救护车！急救！

translation.en: Okay, Suzi. You've gotta tell me who did this.
translation.zh: 好了 苏子 你得告诉我是谁干的

translation.en: Slow down. Don't use your words.
translation.zh: 慢慢来 你别说话 我来猜

translation.en: Let's charade it, okay. Just tell me with your hand.
translation.zh: 慢慢来 你别说话 我来猜 好 用手势就可以

translation.en: Uh, claw. Bear claw.
translation.zh: 爪子 熊掌

translation.en: No. Grizzly bear claw.
translation.zh: 不 灰熊熊掌

translation.en: Oh! Chewy. Chewy.
translation.zh: 哦！耐嚼的

translation.en: So it's Sergei? No, Sergei's dead.
translation.zh: 是谢尔盖吗？不 谢尔盖已经死了

translation.en: [Juan] Hey!
translation.zh: 嘿！

translation.en: Have you got tires on your feet? Good God!
translation.zh: 你跑累了吧？好家伙

translation.en: Spooning. Eating. Uh...
translation.zh: 勺子舀 吃

translation.en: Ice cream. No, no. Gelato. Gelato?
translation.zh: 冰激凌 不 冰激凌？

translation.en: Oh, God. It's amazing how pretty you are when you're-- I'm sorry.
translation.zh: 哦 天哪 你太漂亮了 就连现在…对不起

translation.en: Hey.
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: Hey! Come on!
translation.zh: 嘿！这边！

translation.en: Oh, shoot!
translation.zh: 哦 妈的！

translation.en: Hey!
translation.zh: 嘿！

translation.en: Crazy... crazy... Crazy mad love!
translation.zh: 疯狂 《疯狂愚蠢的爱》

translation.en: It's crazy 'cause you're madly in love with Cavendish.
translation.zh: 你太爱卡文迪什 所以就太疯狂了

translation.en: It's Cavendish, no? Sleeping With the Ene--
translation.zh: 是卡文迪什吗 不是？《与敌共…

translation.en: Sleeping. You're not sleeping.
translation.zh: 睡了 你不能睡

translation.en: -[Nick] She's dead now? -I don't know why this keeps happening!
translation.zh: -她死了？-我不知道为什么总这样

translation.en: [Nick] Let's go! We gotta get out of here.
translation.zh: 快 我们得马上离开

translation.en: -[Nick] Oh, my God. Come on. -[Audrey] Where?
translation.zh: -哦 天哪 快走-去哪？

translation.en: Close the airports! Search house to house!
translation.zh: 封锁机场 挨家挨户搜查

translation.en: As God as my witness, I will find Nick and Audrey Spitz.
translation.zh: 我对天发誓 找不到他俩我决不罢休

translation.en: -Inspector? -Yes?
translation.zh: -督察？-什么事？

translation.en: I have Nick and Audrey Spitz on the phone for you.
translation.zh: 尼克斯皮茨要和你通话

translation.en: -Huh? -Nick and Audrey Spitz.
translation.zh: 尼克斯皮茨

translation.en: Where are you?
translation.zh: 你们在哪儿？

translation.en: We are on our way to Quince's villa right now.
translation.zh: 我们在去肯斯别墅的路上

translation.en: Oh, okay. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 哦 好的

translation.en: I'm sorry, I wasn't prepared for you to actually answer that.
translation.zh: 对不起 你能回答让我很意外

translation.en: We are being framed right now.
translation.zh: 我们被陷害了

translation.en: You meet us at the villa, we will reveal the killer.
translation.zh: 我们别墅见 即时凶手现

translation.en: That kinda rhymed. Which is cool, I think.
translation.zh: -还带押韵的 厉害吧-哦 天哪

translation.en: -[Audrey] Look at this place. -Let's go.
translation.zh: -看看这地方-我们走

translation.en: -[Audrey] Oh, my God. -This is big.
translation.zh: -哦 天哪-太大了

translation.en: This is a big house. This is what they call rich people shit.
translation.zh: 这房子真大这就是我们所说的富人宅第

translation.en: [Audrey] Lord Cavendish is expecting us.
translation.zh: 卡文迪什子爵在等我们

translation.en: Second floor, eighth door on the left.
translation.zh: 二楼 左手第八扇门

translation.en: Yes, that's right. That's what he told us, yeah.
translation.zh: 对 他就是这么和我们说的

translation.en: Okay, so take a five-spotter.
translation.zh: 好 五欧元小意思拿着吧

translation.en: Your five euros is how much American-wise?
translation.zh: 你们五欧元换成美元是多少来着？

translation.en: Six American dollars.
translation.zh: 六美元

translation.en: Oh, that's, uh... that's more than I--
translation.zh: 哦 比我想的…

translation.en: -Can I get a half a euro back-- -Oh, God. Please, Nick. Thank you.
translation.zh: 能找给我半欧元吗？ -照顾一下美国人-拜托 谢谢

translation.en: I didn't know they were ahead of us with the money.
translation.zh: 我不知道他们的钱比我们的值钱

translation.en: -[Audrey] Second floor... -I got no bullets left,
translation.zh: 二楼 左手第八扇门

translation.en: so we'll bluff 'em until Interpol gets here.
translation.zh: 我没子弹了 只能吓唬吓唬等着国际刑警来

translation.en: [Audrey] Honey, you just gotta be careful.
translation.zh: 好 亲爱的 你要小心点

translation.en: This guy has killed four people, that we know of.
translation.zh: 那家伙已经杀了四个我们认识的人了

translation.en: [Nick] Good news is, we know who did it.
translation.zh: 好在我们知道凶手是谁

translation.en: -Okay. -Hard part is over with.
translation.zh: -好-最难的部分已经做完了

translation.en: Okay.
translation.zh: 好

translation.en: And...
translation.zh: 而且…

translation.en: What's up, Dish?
translation.zh: 怎么样 迪什？

translation.en: Stay still! I'll shoot you right in the six-pack!
translation.zh: 不许动 否则我六颗子弹都喂给你

translation.en: -You hear me, bitch? -Calm down, babe.
translation.zh: -听到了吗 混账？-冷静点 宝贝儿

translation.en: Make a move! I dare you!
translation.zh: 我看你敢动一下！

translation.en: I dare-- Oh, my God!
translation.zh: 你敢…哦 天哪

translation.en: -He's dead. -He's dead.
translation.zh: -他死了-他死了

translation.en: -Okay, he's dead. -Oh, my God.
translation.zh: -好吧 他死了-哦 老天爷

translation.en: -What the hell? -Oh, God. Case reopened, babe.
translation.zh: -见什么鬼？-哦 天哪 案子并没结 宝贝儿

translation.en: They must have poisoned his drink!
translation.zh: 他们肯定是给他下了毒

translation.en: -Nick! -And look at his face. It's--
translation.zh: -尼克-你看他的脸 他…

translation.en: I mean, besides the foaming mouth, he still kinda looks good.
translation.zh: 我是说 除了嘴角有泡沫 他还是很帅

translation.en: What is with this man?
translation.zh: 这家伙怎么做到的？

translation.en: We told the police. We called the police. We told 'em to come here.
translation.zh: 我们告诉警察了 我们叫了警察了 -我们还让他们来这儿-对啊

translation.en: -Yes. -We've got to stop them.
translation.zh: 不能让他们来

translation.en: It's not like canceling a pizza, honey. You tell 'em to show up, they show up.
translation.zh: 这又不是点外卖 宝贝儿你叫他们来他们就肯定会来

translation.en: If he's not the killer, who is the killer?
translation.zh: 如果他不是凶手 那凶手是谁？

translation.en: And if we don't know who the killer is before they get here, we're screwed!
translation.zh: 他们来之前我们还找不出凶手的话我们就完蛋了

translation.en: Do you understand this? He's gotta be here in this house.
translation.zh: 你明白吗？他可能就在这个房间

translation.en: This is gorgeous wallpaper. Is that fabric? Is this embossed?
translation.zh: 这壁纸真好看 是壁布？还是雕饰？

translation.en: Sweetheart, you're losing it! You're making me nuts right now!
translation.zh: 亲爱的 你别犯傻了现在我也跟着你犯傻了

translation.en: No, I know. Hold on. Okay.
translation.zh: 不 我知道 等一下 好了

translation.en: All right, it's good. You all right? You breathing?
translation.zh: 好了 没事了 你好了？深呼吸？

translation.en: -I have to breathe through this. -Look at me.
translation.zh: -对不起 让我做个深呼吸-看着我

translation.en: -We gotta turn ourselves in. -Wait, what?
translation.zh: -我们得自首-等等 你说什么？

translation.en: They're all gonna show up. If we run, they're gonna shoot us.
translation.zh: 他们都会来我们要跑的话 他们就会开枪

translation.en: What do you mean? We're gonna just go to jail?
translation.zh: 你什么意思？我们要去坐牢了？

translation.en: It's better than getting shot, ain't it?
translation.zh: 那也比被打死强 对吧？

translation.en: I don't feel-- I don't feel good.
translation.zh: 我感觉…我感觉不好

translation.en: -Babe. -Oh, God.
translation.zh: -宝贝儿-哦 天哪

translation.en: It's an Italian prison.
translation.zh: 是意大利式的监狱

translation.en: You know the food's gonna be incredible.
translation.zh: 你知道食物都很不错的

translation.en: We'll have meatballs and pesto sauce and all that.
translation.zh: 我们还能吃到肉丸沙司什么的

translation.en: It's not co-ed, honey. All right?
translation.zh: 又不是男女同校机构 亲爱的

translation.en: We're-- We're not gonna be in jail together.
translation.zh: 好吧 我们不能一起去坐牢

translation.en: I know.
translation.zh: 我知道

translation.en: Why did you lie to me?
translation.zh: 你为什么要骗我？

translation.en: 'Cause I was... I was, uh... I was embarrassed.
translation.zh: 因为我很难堪

translation.en: With me?
translation.zh: 在我面前？

translation.en: Why? I--
translation.zh: 为什么？我可以帮你的

translation.en: I could've helped you figure that out. That's why we're together.
translation.zh: 为什么？我可以帮你的 -所以我们才在一起-我知道

translation.en: I know.
translation.zh: -所以我们才在一起-我知道

translation.en: Remember when I couldn't pay my rent at the salon,
translation.zh: 记得我在发廊付不起租金的时候

translation.en: and then you were like, "Oh, okay." You got that boot off my landlord's car.
translation.zh: 你说“哦 好吧 我…” 你帮我从房东车上拿下了行李箱

translation.en: -That got me another week. -Yeah, I remember.
translation.zh: 又给我延一星期 -对 我记得-好

translation.en: Remember when your cholesterol was through the roof?
translation.zh: 记得你胆固醇超高

translation.en: And then I made you eat egg whites? You hate egg whites.
translation.zh: 我让你吃蛋白的事吗？ 你讨厌蛋白 我逼你吃 还陪你一起吃

translation.en: And I made you do it, and I did it with you.
translation.zh: 你讨厌蛋白 我逼你吃 还陪你一起吃

translation.en: You helped me not miss yolks anymore.
translation.zh: 你让我再也不馋蛋黄了

translation.en: That's right. That's what we do. We do things together.
translation.zh: 没错 我们就是这样 干什么都一起

translation.en: So can we please just figure this out, too?
translation.zh: 现在我们能不能也一起解决这件事？

translation.en: We just don't know who did it.
translation.zh: 可我们不知道谁是凶手

translation.en: But Nick, we know who didn't do it.
translation.zh: 但是 尼克我们知道谁不是凶手 对吧？

translation.en: -All right? -Right.
translation.zh: 但是 尼克我们知道谁不是凶手 对吧？ 对

translation.en: So let's just go downstairs and act like we figured it out.
translation.zh: 那我们就下楼去装作我们知道的样子

translation.en: If we're gonna do that, we gotta-- we just gotta look confident.
translation.zh: 那就必须要十分自信

translation.en: All right. If we're gonna look confident, we've gotta dress it.
translation.zh: 没错 要十分自信 我们就要穿戴自信

translation.en: I already know what I wanna wear.
translation.zh: 我已经知道我穿什么了

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 穿什么？

translation.en: [Nick] What's up, fools?
translation.zh: 怎么样 傻瓜们？

translation.en: Okay, we solved the case. Boom.
translation.zh: 好了 我们破案了 耶

translation.en: Yo, yo! Where'd you get the clothes? It's a little much.
translation.zh: 哟 你们从哪弄的衣服？也太过了吧

translation.en: Um... I found this beautiful dress in a random closet.
translation.zh: 好吧 我随便在一个衣橱里找到了这条漂亮的裙子

translation.en: -You're looking gorgeous, by the way. -Thanks, baby.
translation.zh: -你太美了 我不得不说-还有…谢谢 宝贝儿

translation.en: -And he got this stunning tux... -Mm-hmm. ...off a...
translation.zh: 他这身是从…

translation.en: Oh, why candy-coat it?
translation.zh: 哦 干嘛说那么好听？

translation.en: -A corpse. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -尸体上扒下来的-对

translation.en: There's another corpse?
translation.zh: 又一具尸体？

translation.en: Jeez! Sorry, yes. Upstairs, eighth door on the left.
translation.zh: 天哪 对不起 是的楼上 左手第八扇门

translation.en: [Colonel] To whom does this dead corpse belong?
translation.zh: 是谁的尸体？

translation.en: Oh, yeah. You guys don't know.
translation.zh: 哦 对 你们都不知道呢

translation.en: -Bad news, guys. -It's terrible. Cavendish is dead.
translation.zh: -坏消息 伙计们 卡文迪什死了-太糟糕了

translation.en: You stole the tux off Charlie's dead body?
translation.zh: 你从查尔斯的尸体上扒下来的衣服？

translation.en: And it fits perfectly. Little tight in the crotch, to be honest.
translation.zh: 很合身呢 说实话裤裆这里有点紧

translation.en: Just kidding. No, he's got me beat. He's got me beat.
translation.zh: 说笑的 不是的 他比我的大

translation.en: Wait. Where's Suzi?
translation.zh: 等等 苏子呢？

translation.en: -She's dead. -Dead.
translation.zh: -她死了-死了

translation.en: -Oh! -Oh, my God!
translation.zh: -哦！-我的天哪！

translation.en: Y'all are like the miniature Manson Family!
translation.zh: 你们就像杀人魔夫妇

translation.en: -No, no, no. -Nick and Audrey Spitz,
translation.zh: -不-尼克和奥德丽斯皮茨

translation.en: -you are under arrest. -[Audrey] Listen.
translation.zh: -你们被捕了-请听我说

translation.en: Ferme la bouche. Is that what it is?
translation.zh: 闭嘴 是吧？

translation.en: -Just give us a second. We got this. -We got this. Let's go.
translation.zh: -给我们点时间 我们来解释-我们来解释 走

translation.en: [Nick] Thank you.
translation.zh: 谢谢

translation.en: All right. Ladies and gentlemen, let's review the facts.
translation.zh: 好了 女士们先生们 我们来理一理

translation.en: [Nick] Malcolm Quince, he was the first to get murdered.
translation.zh: 马尔科姆肯斯 第一个死者

translation.en: We all assumed it was Tobey.
translation.zh: 我们都以为是托比杀了他

translation.en: -No, we all assumed you did it. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 不 我们都以为是你们杀了他

translation.en: -Okay. -Yeah, but Tobey hated his father,
translation.zh: -好吧-对 但是托比恨他父亲

translation.en: and he stood to inherit billions of dollars.
translation.zh: 而且他是亿万家财的继承人

translation.en: -Until he caught some lead to the dome. -Mm-hmm.
translation.zh: 结果自己饮弹而亡

translation.en: -Can you feel me, Raja? -Pew-pew-pew!
translation.zh: 懂我的意思吧 大王？

translation.en: -There it is. -And then,
translation.zh: -没错-然后

translation.en: before Sergei was shot, he told us that the Colonel did it.
translation.zh: 谢尔盖被杀之前他告诉我们是上校干的

translation.en: He told you what?
translation.zh: 他告诉你们什么？

translation.en: But we know you didn't do it, Colonel, because we saw you flossing your teeth
translation.zh: 但我们知道不是你 上校因为我们看到案发当时你正在剔牙

translation.en: when we were shimmying by your window that night.
translation.zh: 我们那晚就在你窗外一摇一摆

translation.en: You two were spying on me in my bathroom?
translation.zh: 你们俩在我卫生间里监视我？

translation.en: Trust me, I did-- We saw a lot of shit that night that I did not want to see.
translation.zh: 相信我 我们那晚确实见识了不少不想看见的龌龊事

translation.en: I mean, apologize ahead of time. We had to see you guys having sex.
translation.zh: 我是说 我要提前道歉当时不得不看你们俩演鸳鸯戏

translation.en: You, um... You... saw that?
translation.zh: 你…你们看到什么了？

translation.en: [Nick] Maharajah, some advice for you.
translation.zh: 大王 给你点建议

translation.en: Maybe grab the bottom and squeeze.
translation.zh: 你或许可以抓住下面捏一捏

translation.en: Huh. Word.
translation.zh: 收到

translation.en: Anyway...
translation.zh: 总之

translation.en: French fries. Yes.
translation.zh: 炸薯条 对

translation.en: Actually, Juan Carlos, you had nothing to do with this.
translation.zh: 其实 胡安卡洛斯 你是无辜的

translation.en: You couldn't have had anything to do with it
translation.zh: 你不可能和整件事有牵扯

translation.en: because you were with us when Suzi got killed.
translation.zh: 因为苏子被杀的时候你和我们在一起

translation.en: -[Nick] So it wasn't you. -[Audrey] Mm-mm.
translation.zh: 所以凶手不是你

translation.en: -It wasn't you. -Mm-mm.
translation.zh: 不是你

translation.en: -It wasn't you. -[Audrey] No.
translation.zh: -不是你-不是

translation.en: It wasn't you.
translation.zh: 不是你

translation.en: Holy shit! Maybe we did do it.
translation.zh: 天老爷 或许真是我们干的

translation.en: -What? -Did you?
translation.zh: -什么？-你干的？

translation.en: -Because listen-- -What did you just say to me?
translation.zh: 因为我当时…不我不知道…我都乱套了

translation.en: -I'm just messing around. -There it is.
translation.zh: 因为我当时…不我不知道…我都乱套了 -这下好了-他在鼓掌了

translation.en: -And he's clapping. -Going to jail. Thanks, babe.
translation.zh: -这下好了-他在鼓掌了 去坐牢吧 真谢谢你了 宝贝儿

translation.en: I'm glad we finally are all on the same page.
translation.zh: 很高兴最终我们达成共识了

translation.en: Now, since the first murder occurred in French territorial waters,
translation.zh: 现在 由于第一起谋杀案发生在法国领海

translation.en: I will be taking you to Paris to be arraigned and tried.
translation.zh: 所以我要带你们去巴黎审判

translation.en: At least we're going to Paris. You always wanted to go.
translation.zh: 至少能去巴黎了你不是总想去巴黎嘛

translation.en: Honey, if you keep making jokes at a time like this,
translation.zh: 亲爱的 你这时候开玩笑

translation.en: it's not gonna make this go away.
translation.zh: -也不可能这件事就过去了-我不知道为什么…

translation.en: [clears throat] Lucky for you, since 1977,
translation.zh: -也不可能这件事就过去了-我不知道为什么… 你们很幸运 从1977年起

translation.en: there has been no death penalty under French law.
translation.zh: 法国法律就已经废除了死刑

translation.en: [whispers] French law. [whispers] French law.
translation.zh: -法国法律-法国法律

translation.en: The French law. Yeah.
translation.zh: 法国法律

translation.en: Surely, Inspector, you of all people
translation.zh: 当然了 督察 还有你们所有人

translation.en: are familiar with the French inheritance law.
translation.zh: 都清楚法国继承法

translation.en: Are you implying I have bastard children?
translation.zh: 你是想说我有私生子？

translation.en: Well, I wasn't.
translation.zh: 不 我不是那意思

translation.en: Because I do. I was surprised you knew about them.
translation.zh: 我确实有 我很意外你们怎么知道

translation.en: I love those little bastards. [chuckles]
translation.zh: 我很爱这几个小家伙

translation.en: Okay. Anyway, um, the French law states that a man's estate
translation.zh: 好吧 总之 法国法律规定

translation.en: must be divided equally amongst his children.
translation.zh: 个人遗产必须平均分给子嗣

translation.en: So it wouldn't matter what the will said.
translation.zh: 所以遗嘱怎么写都不重要

translation.en: Straight up, Maharajah.
translation.zh: 直说吧 大王

translation.en: The kids were gonna get the money, whether the old man married Suzi or not.
translation.zh: 不管老头子和苏子结不结婚钱都是孩子们的

translation.en: Mm-hmm. But both of Malcolm's children are dead.
translation.zh: 但是马尔科姆的两个孩子都死了

translation.en: -Both? -[Nick] Yes. Tobey,
translation.zh: 两个？ 对 托比 还有老头子和马德琳勒巴特利雷的孩子

translation.en: and the son he had with Madeleine LeBoutillier..
translation.zh: 对 托比 还有老头子和马德琳勒巴特利雷的孩子

translation.en: That boy died at childbirth.
translation.zh: 难产死掉的男婴

translation.en: Did he, Colonel?
translation.zh: 死了吗 上校？

translation.en: I spoke to my partner in New York City.
translation.zh: 我和我纽约城的搭档联系过了

translation.en: I said, get the death certificates for Madeleine and the son.
translation.zh: 我说 给我查一下马德琳和她儿子的死亡证明

translation.en: He could only find one for Madeleine.
translation.zh: 他只能找到马德琳一个人的

translation.en: But then I started thinking, maybe there's no death certificate
translation.zh: 然后我就想 或许没有死亡证明

translation.en: because there was no death.
translation.zh: 因为他根本就没死

translation.en: Nonsense. Malcolm desperately wanted a boy to sire the next generation of Quinces.
translation.zh: 不可能 马尔科姆想要儿子继承肯斯家族的财产都想疯了

translation.en: He would never abandon a son.
translation.zh: 他不可能扔掉儿子

translation.en: [stammering] But... what if it was a daughter?
translation.zh: 但要是个女儿呢？

translation.en: -Yes! -What if it was a daughter?
translation.zh: -对！-要是个女儿呢？

translation.en: The love of his life dies,
translation.zh: 他心爱的妻子死了

translation.en: dies giving birth to his unwanted daughter.
translation.zh: 为了生下他不待见的女儿死了

translation.en: -Yes! -It almost makes sense.
translation.zh: -对！-这样几乎就说得通了

translation.en: -It does! It kinda does! -It makes total sense.
translation.zh: -没错 说得通-对 完全说得通

translation.en: He gave her away.
translation.zh: 他把她送人了

translation.en: Then where is she now?
translation.zh: 那她现在人呢？

translation.en: Well, she could be anywhere. She could have got married.
translation.zh: 她可能在任何地方 可能已经结婚

translation.en: She could've joined a gang, changed her name. Who knows? Carry on.
translation.zh: 可能加入了黑帮 可能改名换姓了 -谁知道呢？继续说-改名换姓

translation.en: -Changed her name. -Ah!
translation.zh: -谁知道呢？继续说-改名换姓

translation.en: -You changed your name. -[Nick] Yes.
translation.zh: -你改过名字-对

translation.en: Your real last name isn't Ballard.
translation.zh: 你姓巴拉德

translation.en: So? Lots of artists change their names.
translation.zh: 那又怎么了？很多艺人都会改名字

translation.en: Lady Gaga's real name isn't Lady Gaga.
translation.zh: Lady Gaga的真名并不是Lady Gaga

translation.en: Yes, Lady Gaga. "Paparazzi," yes, good.
translation.zh: 哦 对 Lady Gaga 《狗仔队》 没错

translation.en: But every Grace Ballard superfan knows your first movie was Summer Wetdown.
translation.zh: 但是每个格蕾丝巴拉德的铁杆粉丝都知道你电影处女作是《夏季潮湿》

translation.en: You had three lines, and you went by your birth name,
translation.zh: 你在里面有三句台词 用的是原名

translation.en: Grace Butler.
translation.zh: 格蕾丝巴特勒

translation.en: Which, en français, roughly translates to LeBoutillier.
translation.zh: 法语里 大概翻译就是勒巴特利雷

translation.en: Madeleine LeBoutillier, your mother.
translation.zh: 马德琳勒巴特利雷 是你妈妈

translation.en: This is a joke.
translation.zh: 真会开玩笑

translation.en: I wasn't even in the room when Malcolm Quince was murdered.
translation.zh: 马尔科姆肯斯被杀的时候我根本就不在房间

translation.en: Fine! Then Tobey killed him, but he did it with a little help.
translation.zh: 好吧 那就是托比 但得有人帮他

translation.en: [Audrey] The lights. You turned out the lights.
translation.zh: 灯 你关的灯

translation.en: [Nick] You convinced Tobey to kill Malcolm so you could split the money with him.
translation.zh: 你说服托比杀了马尔科姆然后你和他平分家产

translation.en: [Audrey] And then you killed Tobey so that you could just keep all of it.
translation.zh: 然后你杀了托比这样你就可以独吞了

translation.en: Then me and this girl started asking too many questions.
translation.zh: 然后我和这位女士开始不断质疑

translation.en: So you had to get rid of us.
translation.zh: 你就想除掉我们

translation.en: [Nick] Luckily, not for him, but Sergei gets in the way.
translation.zh: 幸运的是 谢尔盖给我们当了挡箭牌

translation.en: [Audrey] Then you seduce the Maharajah
translation.zh: 然后你勾引大王

translation.en: so that you would make us think you were with him all night.
translation.zh: 好让我们相信你整晚都和他在一起

translation.en: Yo, you were just twizzlin' on my wizzle for an alibi.
translation.zh: 哟 原来你在我身上揉来揉去是想制造不在场证据

translation.en: Girl, that's cold.
translation.zh: 这也太伤人了 美眉

translation.en: You tried to kill us in the library.
translation.zh: 你想在图书馆杀了我们

translation.en: [Nick] You tried to kill us in the market, but you got Suzi instead.
translation.zh: 想在市场杀了我们 却误杀了苏子

translation.en: -And the weapon... -Hm! -I recognize the weapon now. -[Audrey] The dart?
translation.zh: 还有武器 我现在认出那个武器了

translation.en: It was a movie. I watched it one night. You were out with your friends.
translation.zh: -哦 是镖-电影里用过 我有天晚上看过 你和你朋友们出去了

translation.en: You came back drunk and, uh... What the hell was it?
translation.zh: 喝醉了才回来 叫什么名字来着？

translation.en: Princess Blow Dart.
translation.zh: 《吹镖公主》

translation.en: [Audrey] Oh, God.
translation.zh: 哦 天哪

translation.en: That is not the name of a movie.
translation.zh: 那个不是电影名字

translation.en: It is! It is!
translation.zh: -我向天发誓是的-没错！

translation.en: Yo, look at my screensaver.
translation.zh: 哟 看我的屏保！

translation.en: -[Vik] That's her! -[Audrey] Oh, my gosh!
translation.zh: -就是她！-哦 我的天哪！

translation.en: So then you killed Charles
translation.zh: 所以之后你杀了查尔斯

translation.en: because you knew he would never rest until he found out who Suzi's killer was.
translation.zh: 因为你知道 他不查出杀害苏子的凶手是不会罢休的

translation.en: [Nick] 'Cause he loved Suzi, not you!
translation.zh: 因为他爱的是苏子 不是你

translation.en: The three motives: money, love, revenge.
translation.zh: 三种动机：金钱 情爱 报复

translation.en: You were the mastermind
translation.zh: 你就是马尔科姆肯斯

translation.en: behind Malcolm Quince's murders, weren't you?
translation.zh: 谋杀案的幕后元凶 是吧？

translation.en: -And you were the one who framed us. -You killed them all, didn't you?
translation.zh: -也是你陷害的我们-他们都是你杀的 对吧？

translation.en: [Nick] Didn't you?
translation.zh: 对吧？

translation.en: My father was a monster.
translation.zh: 我父亲是个恶魔

translation.en: So you admit it?
translation.zh: 这么说你承认了？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 是

translation.en: I am the daughter of Malcolm Quince and Madeleine LeBoutillier,
translation.zh: 我是马尔科姆肯斯和马德琳勒巴特利雷的女儿

translation.en: and sole heir to the Quince fortune.
translation.zh: 也是肯斯家族遗产的唯一继承人

translation.en: Uh, and... what about the murders?
translation.zh: 那谋杀呢？

translation.en: Oh, I didn't do those.
translation.zh: 哦 都不是我干的

translation.en: But it couldn't have happened to a nicer group of people.
translation.zh: 但如果大家都是好人也不至于到现在这步田地

translation.en: [Delacroix] So... what other proof do you have?
translation.zh: 那你们有什么别的证据？

translation.en: -Of what? -Proof of what?
translation.zh: -什么证据？-证明什么？

translation.en: That she killed everybody?
translation.zh: 证明所有人都是她杀的？

translation.en: Yes.
translation.zh: 对

translation.en: Aren't you gonna do anything at all?
translation.zh: 那你就什么都不用干了？

translation.en: I mean, is there a French holiday we're unaware of?
translation.zh: 是在过什么我们不知道的法国假日吗？

translation.en: What the hell do you do?
translation.zh: -你是干什么的？-难以置信

translation.en: Look... I don't know how you do things in Brooklyn,
translation.zh: 听着 我不知道你们布鲁克林怎么做

translation.en: but here we need evidence to make an arrest.
translation.zh: 但我们这里要逮捕是需要证据的

translation.en: This is not how this is supposed to happen.
translation.zh: 事情不应该是这样的

translation.en: The detective is supposed to explain the murders, which we just did,
translation.zh: 警探就是要还原案情就像我们刚才那样

translation.en: and then the killer is supposed to crack and freak out under pressure and admit it!
translation.zh: 让凶手在压力下崩溃认罪

translation.en: If there's nothing else, I'd like to start spending my money now.
translation.zh: 如果再没什么事了我现在就要开始去花我的钱了

translation.en: The hat. The hat! Uh, take off your hat.
translation.zh: 帽子 把帽子摘下来

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: I said take off your hat.
translation.zh: 我说“把帽子摘下来”

translation.en: No.
translation.zh: 不

translation.en: The Maharajah bought me this hat, and I quite like it.
translation.zh: 大王给我买的帽子 我很喜欢

translation.en: Nick hit the killer in the head with a plate.
translation.zh: 尼克用盘子打中了凶手的头

translation.en: And it left a mark, didn't it?
translation.zh: 留了道疤 是吧？

translation.en: Also, why on earth would you put a hat on a freshly styled head of hair?
translation.zh: 还有 你新做的头发为什么要戴顶帽子？

translation.en: How would you know my hair's been freshly styled?
translation.zh: 你怎么知道我头发是新做的？

translation.en: 'Cause she's a goddamn hairdresser.
translation.zh: 因为她是专业的发型师

translation.en: Please remove your hat, Ms. Butler.
translation.zh: 请你摘下帽子 巴特勒小姐

translation.en: I'll do nothing of the kind.
translation.zh: 我不想摘

translation.en: The butler did it. Grace Butler did it! Grace But-- Right?
translation.zh: 管家巴特勒干的是格蕾丝巴特勒 格蕾丝巴…对吧？

translation.en: -I said it on the plane. -You had to do it!
translation.zh: -我在飞机上说过-必须的

translation.en: -[Grace] Stay back! -Jesus!
translation.zh: -都别过来！-天哪！

translation.en: Everybody!
translation.zh: 都不许动

translation.en: -Oh, my God! -Son of a bitch.
translation.zh: -哦 我的天！-混蛋

translation.en: -Wait! No, no. -Whoa!
translation.zh: 等等 不

translation.en: Nobody move! Nobody move, or I'll shoot her.
translation.zh: 都别动 否则我杀了她

translation.en: Guns down. Baissez vos armes.
translation.zh: 都放下枪

translation.en: [Delacroix] Get an ambulance.
translation.zh: 叫救护车

translation.en: Yo, I thought you said he was a terrible shot.
translation.zh: 哟 我还以为你枪法很烂呢

translation.en: Not when it comes to saving my woman.
translation.zh: 烂也不能在救我老婆的时候烂

translation.en: -I was aiming for her foot, by the way. -[gasps]
translation.zh: 我瞄准的是她的脚 顺便说一句

translation.en: All right. It's all right.
translation.zh: 好了 没事了

translation.en: Thank you for stepping in and trying to stop her, Juan Carlos.
translation.zh: 谢谢你当时帮忙阻止她 胡安卡洛斯

translation.en: That was so brave.
translation.zh: 你太勇敢了

translation.en: I love that. I love that he's brave and I'm, what, nothing?
translation.zh: 他勇敢 那我呢 就没什么了？

translation.en: -Are you kidding? I said you were brave. -You didn't say it.
translation.zh: -你开玩笑吗？我说了你很勇敢的-你没说过

translation.en: I said so many times. "Nick, you were so brave."
translation.zh: 我说过很多次“尼克 你真勇敢”

translation.en: [imitating Juan Carlos] De nada, señora. Halloween.
translation.zh: “万圣节”

translation.en: Yo, I got a question.
translation.zh: 哟 我有个问题

translation.en: In the hotel in Monte Carlo, you said that you saw me and Grace together.
translation.zh: 蒙特卡洛酒店的时候你们说看到我和格蕾丝一起了

translation.en: -We heard you. -We heard you.
translation.zh: -我们都听到了-我们都听到了

translation.en: We didn't like what we heard, but I'll tell--
translation.zh: 我们不想听的 可我和你说…

translation.en: -I'm sorry. -I hope those are new pants, by the way.
translation.zh: -对不起-我希望你这是条新裤子 顺便说一句

translation.en: -[laughing] -Yeah, but... But the truth is,
translation.zh: 是 但实际上

translation.en: Grace and I were together in the bar an hour before we got to our room,
translation.zh: 格蕾丝和我在回房间前一小时都在酒吧里

translation.en: so how could she have killed Sergei if she was with me?
translation.zh: 她和我在一起又怎么去杀的谢尔盖？

translation.en: Nick.
translation.zh: 尼克

translation.en: Audrey.
translation.zh: 奥德丽

translation.en: How did Juan Carlos understand my English just now?
translation.zh: 胡安卡洛斯刚才怎么能听懂我的英语？

translation.en: [Delacroix] Stop!
translation.zh: 站住！

translation.en: No! No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: [Juan] Don't come any closer!
translation.zh: 都别过来！

translation.en: Aah! He speaks English!
translation.zh: 他会说英语！

translation.en: I've spoken English my whole life, you idiots,
translation.zh: 我一辈子都会说英语你们这帮蠢货

translation.en: and a dozen other languages.
translation.zh: 我还说很多门外语

translation.en: And by the way, your Latin sucks.
translation.zh: 顺便提一句 你的拉丁语太烂了

translation.en: You understood it!
translation.zh: 可你听懂了！

translation.en: Don't you even think about it, Colonel, or I will shoot your dick off.
translation.zh: 想都别想了 上校否则我开枪打掉你的鸡巴

translation.en: Put your hands up in the air, now.
translation.zh: 都举起手来 快

translation.en: I am the one who told her to convince Tobey to kill his dad,
translation.zh: 是我让她说服托比去杀了他爸爸

translation.en: destroy this sick family in the name of my father.
translation.zh: 以我父亲的名义毁了这个变态的家族

translation.en: Get into the car.
translation.zh: 上车

translation.en: -[policemen yell in Italian] -[Juan] Back off!
translation.zh: 退后！

translation.en: I go fast.
translation.zh: 我跑得快

translation.en: [Nick] Hey!
translation.zh: 嘿

translation.en: [Nick] Look at that! A Ferrari!
translation.zh: 看那儿 法拉利！

translation.en: -What? -Testarossa!
translation.zh: -什么？-泰斯塔罗莎！

translation.en: Magnum P.I.! Me, baby! I got the mustache!
translation.zh: 《夏威夷神探》！我 宝贝儿！我有胡子！

translation.en: [Nick] This is incredible! This is a fantasy for everybody!
translation.zh: 太不可思议了 这是每个人的梦想

translation.en: [Audrey] How does it open?
translation.zh: -快点！-车门怎么开？

translation.en: [Nick] Underneath! Pull! Pull! Come on!
translation.zh: 下面！拉 快点！

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 哦 天哪

translation.en: What the--
translation.zh: 怎么…

translation.en: -Are you kidding me? -I'm so sorry! I don't know what to say!
translation.zh: -你开什么玩笑？-对不起 我不知道该说什么

translation.en: Go, go, go!
translation.zh: 走！

translation.en: -Put your hands up. Hands up! -Whoa, whoa, whoa!
translation.zh: 举起手来 举起手！

translation.en: [Nick] All I'm saying is,
translation.zh: 我是说

translation.en: when the engine sounds like your sister's voice--
translation.zh: 听到引擎像你姐姐的声音

translation.en: irritating, high, and loud-- you gotta switch gears.
translation.zh: 又尖又亮又刺耳的时候 就该换挡了

translation.en: [Nick] Yes!
translation.zh: 耶！

translation.en: Look how nice you handle this thing!
translation.zh: 看看你开得多好

translation.en: Hey! Hey! Hey!
translation.zh: 嘿！

translation.en: -Honey, he's right up there. -I see him.
translation.zh: -亲爱的 他就在前面-我看到了

translation.en: Again!
translation.zh: 再来

translation.en: Yeah! Baby, nice. Nice! Nice turn!
translation.zh: 宝贝儿 好！转得好

translation.en: [Nick] Look at you! Look at you!
translation.zh: 你真厉害

translation.en: Keep going. Keep after him. Keep after him. Keep going.
translation.zh: 跟住他 继续

translation.en: -Goat! Goat! Goat! -[yells]
translation.zh: 走开！山羊！

translation.en: Holy cow!
translation.zh: 我勒个去！

translation.en: Do you have any idea how gorgeous you look?
translation.zh: 你知不知道你有多迷人！

translation.en: Wait! Second goat! What the hell?
translation.zh: 等等 又一只山羊！怎么回事？

translation.en: -Do you not like goats or something? -I love them!
translation.zh: -你和山羊有仇还是怎么的？-我喜欢山羊

translation.en: Idiots.
translation.zh: 白痴

translation.en: Oh, shit.
translation.zh: 哦 该死

translation.en: Keep going, baby. Go! Go! Go!
translation.zh: 继续 宝贝儿 加油！

translation.en: Go! Go! Go!
translation.zh: 加油！

translation.en: -Holy shit! -Oh, God!
translation.zh: -我勒个去！-哦 老天爷！

translation.en: -We gotta pit him, honey. -I gotta what him?
translation.zh: -我们闹他 亲爱的-我怎么他？

translation.en: What you do is you hit the back bumper and he'll just spin out.
translation.zh: 你只要从后面撞他的保险杠他的车身就会倒转

translation.en: -I can't do that. I can't-- -You got this.
translation.zh: -我做不到-你能行的

translation.en: I can't. He's a Formula 1 race car driver!
translation.zh: 我不行 他是一级方程式赛车手

translation.en: Faster! Come on!
translation.zh: 再快点！来呀！

translation.en: -[Audrey whimpers] -This is our adventure.
translation.zh: 这是属于我们的探险

translation.en: Go for it.
translation.zh: 试一试

translation.en: I can do this. I love you. That was sweet.
translation.zh: 我能行的 我爱你 你真好

translation.en: Okay, here we go.
translation.zh: -好 我们来吧-走喽

translation.en: No!
translation.zh: 不！

translation.en: He didn't spin. He didn't spin. We just gotta take him out.
translation.zh: 他没倒转 我们还要再来

translation.en: -Take him out! -Here we go.
translation.zh: 他没倒转 我们还要再来 -好吧-铲他！

translation.en: Floor it! Floor it!
translation.zh: -好吧-铲他！

translation.en: What?
translation.zh: 什么？

translation.en: Hit the brakes! Hit the brakes! Hit the brakes!
translation.zh: 踩刹车！

translation.en: Do you have any idea how cool you are?
translation.zh: 你知不知道自己有多酷？

translation.en: -Happy anniversary, baby! -Yeah.
translation.zh: -纪念日快乐 宝贝儿-嗯

translation.en: Oh, my God.
translation.zh: 哦 我的天哪

translation.en: -Okay. -Okay.
translation.zh: -好了-好了

translation.en: -I'm gonna go get that guy out of the car. -Go get him.
translation.zh: -我去把那家伙弄出来-去吧

translation.en: [both] I love you.
translation.zh: -我爱你-我爱你

translation.en: -I love you. -Oh, my God.
translation.zh: -我爱你-哦 我的天哪

translation.en: Let's go. Let's go.
translation.zh: 我们走 我来帮你

translation.en: I got you. Come on.
translation.zh: 我们走 我来帮你 来

translation.en: -All right. -[Delacroix groans]
translation.zh: 好了

translation.en: [Juan] I'm so sick of you, cop!
translation.zh: 我恨死你了 破警察

translation.en: You should have never come here!
translation.zh: 你根本就不该来

translation.en: You should have just stayed home, eating hot dogs,
translation.zh: 你应该待在家里吃吃热狗

translation.en: reading People magazine, and watching reality TV.
translation.zh: 读读《人物杂志》 看看真人秀节目

translation.en: [Audrey] Baby.
translation.zh: 宝贝儿

translation.en: You know, that was our-- That was our tour bus!
translation.zh: 知道吗 那是我们的旅游巴士

translation.en: [woman] No toilets, no Wi-Fi, and you're running over people?
translation.zh: 没有厕所 没有无线网 现在还撞人？

translation.en: -Brittany's hogging the window seat! -I want to see the dead guy!
translation.zh: -爸爸 布列尼塔总霸着靠窗的座位！-我想看那个死人！

translation.en: Just sit down and shut up! I'm gonna take a picture!
translation.zh: 都坐下闭嘴！ 我去拍照

translation.en: -All right. I love you. -Oh, my God, this guy--
translation.zh: -没事了 我爱你-为什么你没尽力救他？

translation.en: -We gotta ask 'em how they age ham. -I don't care!
translation.zh: 不过我们还得问问他们火腿是怎么风干的

translation.en: [Nick] Come on!
translation.zh: -走-我不想知道

translation.en: [Delacroix] On behalf of Interpol, I thank you, Mrs. Spitz.
translation.zh: 我代表国际刑警组织感谢你斯皮茨太太

translation.en: You are as brilliant as you are beautiful.
translation.zh: 你很优秀 就像你的长相一样迷人

translation.en: [Audrey] Oh, my gosh. Well, thank you for that.
translation.zh: -哦 我的天哪 谢谢夸奖-她很无畏 是

translation.en: -[Delacroix] And Officer Spitz. -[Nick] I go, what? What?
translation.zh: -还有斯皮茨警官-我呢 怎么样？

translation.en: It seems you are quite the detective after all.
translation.zh: 看来你是个合格的警探呢

translation.en: -[Audrey] You are! -With this girl, yes.
translation.zh: -对 你是-有她才行

translation.en: Something I will be passing along to your superiors in New York.
translation.zh: 我会联系你的纽约上司的

translation.en: That would be big.
translation.zh: 等着看吧

translation.en: I have to tell you, I think this entire experience was pretty great.
translation.zh: 我要说 这次经历真的很精彩

translation.en: -Incredible. -Yeah.
translation.zh: -不可思议-对

translation.en: Outside of the murders, it was on the money.
translation.zh: 除了谋杀案 一切都恰到好处

translation.en: Well, I hope the rest of your trip, which we have arranged for you,
translation.zh: 哦 希望你们余下的旅程能轻松点

translation.en: is more relaxing.
translation.zh: 我们已经帮你们安排好了

translation.en: -Bon voyage. -Well, thank you.
translation.zh: -旅途愉快-谢谢

translation.en: You owe that to us, but thank you so much.
translation.zh: 你们应该给的 不过还是十分感谢

translation.en: You ever come to New York, you look us up.
translation.zh: 去纽约的时候一定去看我们哦

translation.en: We'll pin, uh, a triple homicide on you or a kidnapping or something.
translation.zh: 我们给你定三个杀人罪或者绑架罪什么的

translation.en: -Thank you. Okay. -Thank you so much.
translation.zh: -他开玩笑的-好的 -谢谢-认识你很高兴

translation.en: Good to meet you. All right. Be safe.
translation.zh: -再见-好的 一路顺风

translation.en: -Good anniversary, right? -Amazing anniversary.
translation.zh: -纪念日过得不错 是吧？-太棒了

translation.en: -Kind of-- Kind of a cool one. -Loved it!
translation.zh: -还有点酷-我喜欢

translation.en: What did you get me, by the way, for a present?
translation.zh: 你给我准备什么礼物了顺便问一句？

translation.en: What? Oh, uh...
translation.zh: 什么？哦

translation.en: I got you the Amazon gift card.
translation.zh: 我给你准备了亚马逊礼物卡

translation.en: -You did? -No, I didn't get you anything.
translation.zh: -是吗？-没有 我什么都没给你准备

translation.en: ♪ See what happiness has done ♪
translation.zh: （东方快车）
